I purchased the 16GB model because of a review that reminded me of the cloud, so I can keep the storage at a useful level.All in all, it is "as advertised" and I am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Danielle Stapleton
Reviews.Content: Don't know what to say.  I like my kindle, only issue was my daughter was about to totally reset to factory settings and lost everything I had on here. Had to redownload it all. Wish that was under parental block too so needed password to access settings

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: PAUL H WHEELWRIGHT
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas this year and I love it. I read books, surf the web, I have even been learning Swedish on it. It is a little different the Apple and Samsung as far as navigating around, but it did not take very long to get really comfortable with it. It is very thin and light weight. The programs load quick and the graphics are awesome!!! My wife has an I Pad, there is no way I would trade my HDX for it. I bought one of the folding covers in leather. It works great all so. I would buy this tablet again and again.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase!
Reviews.Author: Hiwartha V. Donaldson
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet.  I am a workaholic but this tablet is basically for entertainment and it does just what it is made for.

Reviews.Title: Terrific product
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: My huband bought this for himself as a Christmas gift and absolutely loves it .... he is a big reader and had been adamant about having the "feel" of the book in his hands .... now he's addicted to his tablet and downloading his books there .... he says he now doesn't need a light to read and that makes it easy to take with him to catch a read at lunch or waiting in a dr's office ..

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: claire osgood
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Easy to adjust.  Apps I added work well.  Loading speed is average.  It does take a little time to get used to the touchiness of the tablet, but once you have used it a while it is manageable.  Games  are easy to play and see.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9' HDX Display, WiFi, 64 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Nia Adero
Reviews.Content: This is THE BEST tablet ever!!! I have everything else by Apple, but I just did not want to pay the ridiculous price that Apple wanted for an iPad. This tablet is actually better in my opinion, for much less money than I would have paid for an iPad! I love the Mayday button and the new way of navigating, along with more GB and the larger HDX screen. The special offers are not bad either because if I am not interested, I just swipe it away, so the discount off the price I received because of these ads is well worth it! This is a great purchase for anyone of any age!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for the Price
Reviews.Author: Thoth
Reviews.Content: There not much I can say that hasn't already been said.  Once I got AirDriod installed on it I am free to install what ever I want that isn't available on the Amazon store with out jail breaking the device.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Love my new kindle fire hdx. I am pretty new to all the touch screen technology but find that this device is pretty user friendly. Display has beautiful picture. I have been able to get any app that I was interested in for free on amazon. Sound is loud and clear when watching a movie. Easy wi-fi connection. Have only used for browsing so far. Have not downloaded music or books but as a web browsing device it is very fast and easy.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for the Price
Reviews.Author: Thoth
Reviews.Content: There not much I can say that hasn't already been said.  Once I got AirDriod installed on it I am free to install what ever I want that isn't available on the Amazon store with out jail breaking the device.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Love my new kindle fire hdx. I am pretty new to all the touch screen technology but find that this device is pretty user friendly. Display has beautiful picture. I have been able to get any app that I was interested in for free on amazon. Sound is loud and clear when watching a movie. Easy wi-fi connection. Have only used for browsing so far. Have not downloaded music or books but as a web browsing device it is very fast and easy.

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Jasmyne
Reviews.Content: I picked my Kindle up from the Post Office.  I love it... Now I looking for a real neat cover for my Kindle. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: KIndle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Joyce S, Spence
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet for some time and all the Christmas ads drove me insane!  Finally a day or so before Christmas, my husband told me to order what I wanted.  It took some time to arrive, but was well worth the wait!  I am also a PRIME member, so the free streaming content, free books, and lending library have been wonderful complements. The pictures are so sharp and the colors so vivid!  I worried about the ads, but they are completely unobtrusive.  In fact, I have actually taken advantage of several of them.  My kindle holds a charge for a two or three days, a big improvement over my smart phone or mini computer.  All in all, this has been one of my better purchase decisions!

Reviews.Title: my new kindle
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: I had the original Kindle and I had some issues with it, however everything is A,O.K. with this one.  I love it, when my granddaughter comes over it's the first think she asks for, can I play with your kindle? She loves it too.

Reviews.Title: I Love It Love it Love It
Reviews.Author: dray
Reviews.Content: I am actually glad they made me choose this one. I would not have been as happy with the old style as I am with this one.dra

Reviews.Title: I'm a fan of Amazon
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did my homework on the options I wanted for the price. As far as the movies, the amount of movies to download if you are a prime member for offline viewing is limited and the movies are older movies. However, there is a vast amount of movies to watch while you are online. As well at t.v. shows, etc. I signed up for the prime membership to get the most use out of my Kindle Fire. The graphics are great, download speeds are fast, and cloud storage is great! I also love the lending library, many great titles available for free! As well as all of the regular titles that Amazon offers for free! I do not have any issues with apps not being availble from the play store, Amazon has a great many apps available. I love the cloud storage because I do not have to use up my kindle space to store my books, movies, pictures, or any other items.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Diamond
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet.  It is everything that I was looking for in a tablet and more.  It is so bright and everything is crystal clear on it and I just love using it.  I sure do recommend it to everyone.  The Apple IPad might be the in thing but you can get the same things on this Kindle Fire as the IPad and it is cheaper and so much nicer.  I love the "Live" person that is on there to help when you need it.  I had to use it for the first time, just a few days ago, and it was awesome.  She walked me right through everything that I needed help with.  I recommend this product to everyone who is just contemplating buying a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Faster than the previous Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Donna J. Kelley
Reviews.Content: I read several reviews and finally decided to upgrade to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi.  I'm so glad that I did, because now I can sit in my living room and download content without getting dropped and I can play games on it without it freezing and taking forever to upload. I'm very happy with my purchase and would recommend it to anyone that is thinking of upgrading to this generation.  There's only one draw back really, that if you upgrade to 4G and you aren't currently going through AT&T; or Verizon for your internet, that you would have to pay for this service.  Since 4G is not currently available in the area I live in, it made perfect sense to go with Wi-Fi.

Reviews.Title: As Advertized
Reviews.Author: 1st Sgt
Reviews.Content: Putting out over $350 was a hard decision for this cash-strapped retired person.  I have the $69 Kindle, and had it loaded up with books.  When my new Kindle arrived, I registered it, and all my books transferred over automatically...something I was worried.  I did have a problem with signing into Kiva, a micro finance institution.  I pushed the "Help" button, and in 5 seconds there was a gal on my screen asking, "How can I help you".  I told her my problem.  She did some kind of hokey poky inside my Kindle, then asked me to try to sign in.  Bingo..it works just fine.  What a great feature, what a great device!  Faster downloading apps and internet pages than my Galaxy S3.  Enjoy yours.

Reviews.Title: MY HUSBAND IS JEALOUS OF MY KINDLE LOVE AFFAIR....LOL!!!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Mendez
Reviews.Content: I have become a hardcore Kindle freak.... and now I have two...one 7inch hdx and one 8.9inch hdx....Love em both....I'm a nurse so the 7inch hdx I use for work and the 8.9 hdx is for having fun at home. I'm a reader and a movie buff so the so called "closed" system of Kindle isn't an issue for me. Any google app I have on my android I have either successfully  found on kindle's system or found a satisfactory or BETTER replacement for it....seriously the best tablet anywhere for those who don't require a windows os. The screen resoulution is AMAZING....I'm a prime member too so I have TONS of free movies to watch....the speed is lightening fast and no freezing issues as some have experienced. I love AMAZON....who ever owns this company...."WAY TO GO!!!! I HOPE YOU BECOME A BILLIONAIRE BECAUSE YOUR SERVICES, PRODUCTS AND COMMITMENT TO EXELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE ACTUALLY MAKE PEOPLE'S LIVES BETTER" XXOO ;-)

Reviews.Title: almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Bob Linda
Reviews.Content: Would be a 5 star, but the Wi-Fi disconnects too much, my wife's IPad stays connected much better, and its only a gen3

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: M.Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I own 3 Kindles,The original Paper White, Kindle Fire HD, and now The New Kindle Fire HDX8.9. Although I love them all,the latest is perfect for me! The 1st. One was only for reading,out in my porch,at the pool in the summer. When I saw the Fire in color,and it was pretty much like a laptop I bought it and loved everything about it. It did have a glare,but that was fixed with a screen saver. I have a lot of health problems,and my Kindle keeps me company and reading is my pass time,but one of my disabilities is my eyesight is getting really bad. The New Fire HDX, 8.9, has a nice sized screen, no glare, more clear, and a lot thinner and lighter. I don't have any bad things to say about either of them but this one is perfect! Thank you to the makers, and Thank you to Amazon for the super fast 2 day Prime Shipping. If anyone has thought about buying a kindle this is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Look out Apple!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The tablet is fast enough, has gorgeous color and he picture, is incredibly light, and even for a low tech writer, fairly easy to operate once you fool around with it for a few days.Mayday is excellent for when you really get confused. Great idea. I am sure everyone will soon copy it!Don't miss the Google play store since I buy those apps on my Samsung Galaxy S4 phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it except for the Sound
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I was already the proud owner of the Kindle Fire HD 7" and decided to get the 8.9' Kindle Fire HDX in addition, for the larger screen and two way camera.  I found the sound to be a bit distorted and low in volume, compared to HD 7". Then I compared it to the Kindle Fire HDX 7" (my sister-in-law) and it was the same result, both 7" were clear and loud compared to the muddled sound of the 8.9".  I proceeded to return twice and I found all three Kindle Fire HDX 8.9' I tried were all comparable in sound.  I gathered that the 8.9" is calibrated at a lower volume, all three were not audible until one quarter up the volume scale.  I am hopping this was done for engineering reasons like vibration or something than an evil plot to get you to buy speakers, which I did.  If anyone knows the real story please share it with me.

Reviews.Title: Bought for Photography / Miracast
Reviews.Author: Nanhenker
Reviews.Content: I did not have or need a tablet, but I wanted a quick and clean way to mirror photos and video to the big screen, and I have been a long-time user of Verizon mobile hotspot connectivity because I'm never at home.  I was instantly impressed with the color display as well as the very decent audio.  I consider myself a serious amateur photographer, and I have  to say that I am using my Kindle for quick clear macro shots instead of my cameras; but of course this is only a tablet camera. The connectivity is flawless, and the download speeds are like lightning with the double processors. I have used this device to control my GoPro camera remotely; nice!  (Although the free app had to be sideloaded.)  I do wish the built in Silk web browser had Flash compatibility, and the that the Google Play store was not blocked.  There are other sites that you can get apps from, and I understand why Amazon wants to protect itself as well as our devices, but the Amazon app store is severely limited.  There are simple effective workarounds for most major complaints here, and I have used the Amazon experimental video streaming player, however on some sites (read: subscription) where it will  not work when the content is routed off the site's servers to Amazon's servers. I'm working on how to fix this.  I have used every major feature except the Miracast, which I will try when I get an adapter for the TV, but so far, the device is lovely and fast!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet
Reviews.Author: Zettie
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful tablet.  I wanted to upgrade from my older Kindle Fire and this is great.  It is lightweight and easy to read.  I am enjoying all of the great features of this tablet.

Reviews.Title: luv it!
Reviews.Author: Marge s
Reviews.Content: Have last year's version and wondered if it would be noticeably improved. Yes! The clarity of screen is amazing.  The battery life is much improved. I am a heavy user and the battery lasts two days.I am very pleased with this purchase so far.

Reviews.Title: Fast, convenient, and fun
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I rated this product so high because it performed consistently, was very thin and it's a lightweight. It was easy to carry and connected seamlessly with other bluetooth devices. It is easy on the eyes to read books for long periods of time, and then in the next instant search the internet quickly to bring near instant information to your fingertips. There are lots of good apps to choose from and I think it is priced well. It seems to have enough memory on board to do most anything the average user may need to do. After a month of use, I couldn't tell that it was even used. The screen held up to normal use and I can't see any visible scratches on the surface. It feels like a durable product and will potentially last a long time.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: A Hernandez
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet.  I am so glad I chose the Kindle HDX to me it is better than an Ipad or any other type of tablet I have seen other people using. For my money Kindle HDX all the way.  Great clarity, easy to use.  I'm not a computer person so easy is real important to me.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: derek corson
Reviews.Content: first purchased my wife a kindle reader. used daily till the batteries died. bought her an upgrade and my daughter got number one. i finally broke down and got the first color kindle. again used daily till the batteries die. looked at the 8.9 and thought about it until Amazon had a special, so no excuses! 64 gb all out, love it. havent seen anything better yet!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Was a gift to me. User friendly, this is my 1st kindle. Easy to read from the screen& I like the auto-brightness feature. Great battery life, charge every few days. Saves me from opening my large laptop for simple tasks such as checking email, a recipe or reading a book. I really like the malware screen protector kit I put on it too.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Deon Rosegreen
Reviews.Content: The kindle hdx is an awesome machine. I've done a lot of tablet research and I was unable to find any other tablet with as much ram and processor speed. A huge benefit is the wifi range. My iPhone could not find the network as to the kindle could see it and even had two bars. (That's insane) pretty much the only cons I have are the lack of none expandable memory which at this point isn't that much if an issue. Secondly the semi closed app market. Things like iTunes sync you have to pay for but again this is a minor issue. All in all I couldn't ask for a better tab. Money well spent if you ask me.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: GFRESH
Reviews.Content: The is my first tablet, i hve been watching "the kindle fire hdx 8.9 vs the ipad" for a few months, until i decided to get thet kindle. I even thik my wife is jealous that my KF is better than her I

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: garry shavers
Reviews.Content: Very nice screen is amazing does everything I have ask it to do. Still testing it.. I read lots of reviews and I am glad I went with this kindle.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for Media consumption
Reviews.Author: K. Lange
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is the best tablet for media consumption there is. I have 9 Tablets including 4 kindles and I always reach for my HDX 8.9 first.There are a coulple of advertised features that are more help than hype:Printing: you need an app which is free but any tablet can print to a wireless printer with the right software.Office Suite: is read only.Rear facing camera: Is OK but I don't have a lot of need to take pictures sittin on my couch watchin' a movie. Also the slide the tablet out of the Origami case to expose the camera thing is more cute than usefull.Second screen, only for Samsung tvs and PS/3s Not exactly a wide market.Miracast: The device they recommend for the kindle  has only a 3 out of 5 star rating and costs $59, and then you still have to have an hdmi cable from it to the TV. I haven't got up the guts to risk it yet. I would've rather they kept the hardware port.Display: Gorgeous.Processor: Fast. The tablet can navigate as fast as I can swipe.Some of the stuff that deserves the Hype:Mayday: its everything they say it is.64GB: I can watch all day and all night if I have the power for it.New Buttons: These are way better than the old especially using them through a case.text to speech:  you got like 6 different english voices to choose from with the HDX and they sound very realistic.Origami Case:  Thinnest Rotatable standing case you'll ever find. Holding the tablet in with magnets is strange, but you get used to it.Better wifi:  My HD8.9 had problems with my router, and I would have to recycle my router once every day or so to get it back on line. My HDX has no such problems.

Reviews.Title: Gramma is getting technology smart
Reviews.Author: Joyce Schwartz
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning what this piece of technology can do. So far am having fun with it and looking forward to learning more.

Reviews.Title: Great...but.
Reviews.Author: Paul Shetley
Reviews.Content: Not compatible with flash player or dolphin browser like my kindle hd was. Other than that...Great! I recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase
Reviews.Author: Diane S
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best purchase I have ever made for myself.  Some of the reviews had me concerned about the view on the screen but I am not experiencing any problems.  I mostly use mine for reading but I have had no problems with any of the other features.  The camera takes better pictures then my digital camera which I paid almost as much for as the kindle. I like the bigger screen too.  Reading in bed is great too.  Not needing to have a light on is very beneficial if someone else is in the room trying to sleep.  l Love my kindle!

Reviews.Title: First Tablet E-Reader
Reviews.Author: ThatTexanDude56
Reviews.Content: E-Reading +Magazines +/- Not all Mags are digital yet. Need a digital subscription to the The Horse Backstreet Choppers!Surfing Net +Android Games + /- (Not All Work Games For Kindle)Camera + /- (Cannot use for Instagram)Skyping +/- Auto focusing makes a dinging sound kind of annoying. The fix keep you tablet still don't walk around with it.Video +Sound +

Reviews.Title: Lovin' my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: D. Stone "Bedford Wife"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is all I expected it to be.  It performs quickly and without very many glitches.  It is not a PC, so it does sometimes have issues opening web pages or with links, but by downloading a second browser, I could get around many of those.  I'm still exploring the many things I can do with my Kindle.  Reading on it is great, once I stopped trying to flip the pages ;)  There are so many free books available, too!  I've taken some good photos, used Skype, and played games with my grandkids.  The Special Offers included are not annoying, only seen on the opening screen.  My only concern is that it does eat up battery time pretty quickly when browsing or playing games.  I find it needs charging nearly every night.  Was awesome to have it on a recent trip.  So light to carry on a plane!

Reviews.Title: email does not sync, printing difficult
Reviews.Author: steve phillips
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed to find out that email does not sync.  I have att.net and while all the email loads, there are no contacts, folders or updating of deleted, sent, etc.  I have to manually delete all received emails.  Printing to my wireless canon pixma722 printer does not appear possible (or easily done) is another major issue.  To me, email and printing are basic functions of a tablet that should be a given feature.

Reviews.Title: Stays on it.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "fletch1"
Reviews.Content: I think I've lost my wife. She stays on it to much. But I'm happy she loves it. Oh well , at least she's home.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Carol Donovan "Luv my Westie pup"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son for Christmas along with the wireless keyboard.  as a MAC user myself, I was absolutely impressed with the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 - when I can, I plan on purchasing one for myself! Sorry Apple

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet (but)
Reviews.Author: Clinton
Reviews.Content: This product is right up there with those of Apple and Samsung. I actually tried it out for 30 days for free while I had my ipad air with me. The screen is magnificent and bright much more superior to that of the ipad air. Some games actually tend to run smoother on it and I never experienced any sort of lag. It's perfect for movies, videos and some games in particular. The tablet is comfortable to hold in the hands.Now cons- from the very first day the back panel attracts fingerprint so much and is very noticeable and might be a turn off for some.The operating system is so boring and very dull looking. It's not cool and very non adjustable. I wish they had gone for an open android like system.Extra - the cameras are average, like any other tabletAll in all this is a very good product and I was very impressed with it and even though I chose the ipad over it, the only significant benefit from that is just the numerous tablet optimized apps for the ipad. Otherwise this is better.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offer
Reviews.Author: Ella Lindenhofen
Reviews.Content: I just received my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", 16 GB tablet an hour ago, so I will have to return in a month or two to give a true review, but I can say that I am a 67 year old widow and not what you would call an expert in the field of high tech gadgets. I took the Kindle out of the box, plugged it in and synced up with my router and was up and running in no time. If you can read directions you can set this up without a problem. I actually watched Downton Abbey first episode from Amazon Prime and it was incredible. Picture quality is outstanding, and the sound is fantastic. There are still plenty of feature's to explore, as I would like to stream movies and watch them on my TV, etc.  I will write a follow-up in a month to see if I am still as elated as I am today.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Kinney
Reviews.Content: This is my 7th Kindle purchase, and so far the best. I have given kindles to family members and they share my enthusiasm for the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I. LOVE. IT.  Beautiful display, excellent sound.  Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Sandra Acquistapace
Reviews.Content: The problem is I never want to put it down.  Watching movies with some headphones is similar to watching on my large screen tv. (not kidding).  The device is very responsive has plenty of options/settings to personalize to your preferences, such as changing the "sleep" timer setting (default is 5 minutes).  To get the full benefits of owning this latest 8.9" HDX Kindle Fire you might want to consider becoming an Amazon Prime member.  Excellent product and Worth Every Cent!!

Reviews.Title: the fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Nancy Saladin
Reviews.Content: The weight of the kindle is light.  The screen is very easy to read.  I enjoy using it, but it did freeze up on me once, and I couldn't turn it off or do anything with it.  It ran out of power of its own accord and seems to be working okay now.

Reviews.Title: why I love my kindle fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: This was a first purchase for me and I was NOT disappointed !! I researched a good bit, prior to purchasing the Kindle Fire and found it was recommended as being superior to it's competition. I would highly advise anyone looking for any device that does it all, with ease of use, to get themelves a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. I just love it !!

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I purchased it as a gift and she can't put it down.  Between having all her books and the other internet apps, its constantly in use.  A solid tablet that is focused on her primary love of books.  A winner.

Reviews.Title: Needs a manual
Reviews.Author: Jolene B. Davis
Reviews.Content: I'm amazed at what the Kindle can do, but wish it had come with a paperback manual.  I checked out a book from the library called Kindle Fire: the missing manual, the book that should have been in the box.  It has helped tremendously.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: carmen c. rivera
Reviews.Content: it's easy to use and small enough to take anywhere yet large enough screen to enjoy it. husband loves it as i bought for him my PC was a bit much but somehow the Kindle is not so intimidating as the large PC i use.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: diana vanduinen
Reviews.Content: I purchased three kindles in December for gifts for my husband and two children.  The picture quality is amazing. They love them..

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: terry
Reviews.Content: Have old Kindle but the 7 inch screen was not big enough. was looking for some thing more decided on the HDX 8.9 glad I did love it. Movies are great on it.

Reviews.Title: Loking for the best tablet/e-reader then look no further.
Reviews.Author: Jacque Bagwell "IamLuved"
Reviews.Content: I have three Kindles now and I have to say this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is the very best. I've used my parents iPad before but I wouldn't trade my Kindles for anything in the world. My Kindles are my most treasured possessions. If you're looking for the best tablet/e-reader on the market then a Kindle HDX is a MUST!

Reviews.Title: How do you love something more?
Reviews.Author: Tourman "I'm a 4th generation native of Eurek...
Reviews.Content: I loved my 1st generation Kindle Fire - 7" so how do I describe how I love my new HDX 8.9 even more? I just do! It's faster, bigger, yet not too big, it's sharper, thinner, lighter, better sounding, very easy to set up and I love the voice recognition capability. I am a big user of that feature on my cell phone and really missed it on the original Kindle Fire. I am 55 years old and have a 55 inch Samsung TV, yet I find myself watching more and more movies and programs on my HDX 8.9. I guess when you're in love you really can't find anything bad to say about the object of your affection. So, I will leave it at that!

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love It!
Reviews.Author: Deena Jemery
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire.  It is so much fun and so versatile.  Don't know why I waited so long to get one.  Easy to set up (almost no real effort involved) and use it daily.Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to use and video is great I would recommend it to any one. Reading books is easy on the eyes.

Reviews.Title: Changed Views on Kindle
Reviews.Author: Shannon E.
Reviews.Content: Love this product...I had no desire for a tablet type system and when I reviewed the special offer and read up on the he Kindle Fire I thought I would try it...great visual and sound as well as being handy on the go. Battery life is great as well. I charge every night so I don't know how long it will go without charge but I watched 2 movies at hospital stay accessed FB, checked email and played a couple of games to pass the time and it never went below 50% battery life.

Reviews.Title: Great compliment to your PC
Reviews.Author: Lenny Leonard
Reviews.Content: If you already have a personal computer, and want an easy way to read, watch tv or movies, listen to music or browse the internet, this is the device for you.  I prefer it to the Apple Ipad Air.I bought the 1st generation Kindle Fire in Dec of 2011 and loved it.  It was much more convenient and portable than a pc for media consumption.  I used it every day.This Dec 2013, I splurged and bought the Fire HDX 8.9.  Every feature has been vastly improved over the 1st gen, including adding front & rear cameras and a microphone.  Books, magazines, music, movies, tv, and games all work great!Caveat:  I never use my Kindle for work, only for fun, so I don't know how it handles work documents.I love:  The gorgeous larger screen, the smooth response, the lighter weight and longer battery life.  I think it is the best value for a tablet computer.However:  You need to have an Amazon account set up, have WiFi available and a home PC.  I think Amazon Prime is overpriced;  you don't need it, but go ahead and use up the 30 day trial period offered.  Also there is no Adobe Flash support, no HMDI, and no access to Google Play apps.  But none of these has been a problem for me.Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Tablet meets the content!
Reviews.Author: Sam C.
Reviews.Content: I bought this during December promo ($50 off via amazon cc). I've owned many Ipads and Android tablets. I've read many helpful reviews here (thanks guys) before buying this tablet. Just few thoughts(i) It's lighter than the Ipad Air; ok, I never held the air but this tablet is not feathery light for me. My kindle reader ($69) I think is "light". Not that this is heavy but I was not comfortable holding it with one hand.(ii) apps; right. I use dropbox a lot. I know I can side-load those apps whatever but at this point, I don't care. I do all my works on windows laptop. If I need to read something then I will use web to access those files. I just don't care any more. I'm sure Apple has unique apps that you need for your work and school...so then buy ipad. Simple. But for me. I don't use those special apps. So This HDX works out fine for me(iii) in the end, question is, what do you do with your tablet. For me, I read Kindle books and watch Free Prime Videos. I know Ipad is able to watch Prime. But again, this tablet makes everything Amazon content related matter easier. When I went to 3 day trip, I downloaded 2 TV shows and 1 video. With many Kindle book loaded, I felt like I was ready. And my trip was fun and exciting. I know those limit (2 shows) sucks. But in the airplane, I switched to books and watched videos when I had spare time during the trip. So it worked out fine.Ask: what do I do with my tablet? If it's Prime contents and Kindle books, then, you need to get this. If your work requires those special apps for ipad, then, you should get that.Also ask: how long do you keep your gadget? If you spend $500 + tax + accessories on cheapest Ipad, then, you should make or generate more income than $500. But as for me, I never used a device more than 1 year. So if I'm gonna upgrade every 1.5 years, then, I would get by with perfectly fine HDX 8.9. When time comes, then, I will buy newer one.I'm very happy as I read, read, and read on this and watch many cool prime shows (I think they have better TV shows like "Vikings" or "Tudors" than the movies). And I think $500 + for consumption only is too much.Only thing that I wish for HDX is that other manufactures bring out folio keyboard cases.Buy this. I am enjoying this more than any ipads and android tablets I've owned (total 6 tablets so far)

Reviews.Title: I had my doubts, but this proved to be an excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: sinecure
Reviews.Content: From the specs, I could see this had the best hardware available among tablets (as of Dec 2013) - a 2.2 GHz quad core processor and a display that's out of this world, all with a weight of just over 13 oz. But the OS is not stock Android, so app compatibility was a concern. But I was able to load 1mobile market just fine, and through it several apps including Nook, Firefox, and Chrome. Couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Candy Cane
Reviews.Content: I've had my kindles for several months and we have zero regrets.  They're durable and work amazingly well.  We also have iPad in the house but will not be getting upgrades.  We are sticking with Kindles from now on.  For our uses, primarily entertainment and internet, the Kindle is hands down the favorite.The speakers are far superior in sound and placement to the iPad.  The screen display is on par.  The speed and software seems less temperamental than the iPad.Buy it.  Buy one for someone you love.  The best value of any tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: RWL
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother for Xmas, and she loves it. She watches movies, and reads books, and plays games, puzzles, etc. She is 71 and learned how to use it quickly, I did have to give her a few updates on how to do things, but she uses it almost everyday!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: BR "Boo Ray"
Reviews.Content: It is fast, clear, easy to use, with a great screen resolution! I bought it for my wife for Christmas and she loves it. One reason I did not want an iPad was the proprietary chargers and accessories you must buy from Apple. The Kindle Fire came with a charger but it also recharges with any of our phone chargers, you don't need a special plug like you do with Apple products.It is lightweight and has a longer than expected battery life. The speed, clarity, and ease of use exceeded our expectations! I would recommend to anyone looking for a tablet. No disappointments  here!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: Replaced my Kindle Fire 7" with the HDX 8.9 and am loving it!  Not sure about the "special offers" not liking that part.  Might have been worth the few extra bucks to buy without the special offers.

Reviews.Title: You Won't Be Sorry
Reviews.Author: MonaMe
Reviews.Content: Great little device.  Amazing picture.  Really nice when coupled with Amazon Prime.  You won't be sorry with the Kindle.  Wish they had more choices for covers.  Hopefully Amazon will step up with more choices.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Device
Reviews.Author: Kerry Spiker
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle HDX. However, I would not recommend purchasing the 4G capability.  It is not necessary if you have access to Wi-Fi.  I did, but I learned  from my cell phone provider that they will assess me an additional charge each month if I activate the device.  So I've chosen not to activate the device.....bottom line...... I paid extra for the 4G capability that I will never use.  In addition, you may need to investigate the compatibility of the HDX's wireless with your television.  I've been unable to push the image from the HDX to any of my TVs.  I used the Mayday button for help (which is pretty cool) and was informed I would need to purchase Netgear's Push to TV device.

Reviews.Title: So happy I bought this Kindle
Reviews.Author: Christie L Eller
Reviews.Content: So I been wanting a tablet for awhile but could not afford one. Of course, I was holding out for an iPad. However, Amazon's fantastic offer made my day.  I thought I'd give the Kindle a try and I am glad I did. I love it. I can read books, listen to music, take pictures and video, watch movies and keep up on mail and social networks without lugging my laptop around. I love that I can take it in the kitchen and access my recipe sites, plus listen to music while I cook. It has much better sound than my Dell laptop. Plus, it fits nicely in my purse. I do not find the special offers annoying and there are more than enough apps to meet my needs. I am sort of an anomaly in that I don't have a smart phone or any Apple products. The Kindle really meets all my needs at a fraction of the cost of the iPad. I am very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I made the switch from the Nook Color to this, and I have absolutely no regrets!!!  I was nervous at first, but after having my kindle for a few weeks I'm upset that I didn't make the switch sooner!  The product itself is just so much better - the operating system is simpler and easier to navigate, the display is so much more vivid, and I've even noticed that 50% of the books that I had on my B&N; wish list were cheaper on Amazon (the others were the same price - none were higher).  Definitely love my new Kindle, as both an e-reader and as a tablet!

Reviews.Title: What an excellent machine.
Reviews.Author: Pamster
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle, and certainly my favorite.  It's great for reading, but then, all of them are.  I downloaded some movie rentals to take on a trip, and even though I downloaded them in the lowest quality resolutoin in order to save space on the device, they still displayed beautifully on the device itself.  (Not sure how they would have looked on a TV screen or larger monitor, but I wasn't trying that.)  Today I got it set up to stream to my TV using Display Mirroring - what a great feature that is.  I can hardly wait to try out some more of the features.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Gassner
Reviews.Content: I have had two previous kindles.  One with the keypad as the bottom, which I broke, and the second the kindle touch.  Loved it, but missed the backlit feature of the ipad I had borrowed while waiting for the second kindle to arrive.  The paperwhite was not out then.  Later purchased a cheap tablet on line from Walmart, which worked fine, but was slower than all get out.  Ordered the fire hdx when amazon offered the no interest financing, and all I can say is WOW.  Speed and performance wise, it left the tablet sitting in the dust.  Was kind of alien at first, but learned more about the fire each day, making it more fun  and productive to use each day.  I now find myself reading while listening to free music, and checking my email inbetween.  The only thing I wish that kindle had included, was a slot for SD cards, but hey, who knows what tomorrow holds.

Reviews.Title: This is the best Kindle by far
Reviews.Author: Dennis C. Rahn
Reviews.Content: If you read books or surf the web, this is for you.  It is the best Kindle by far and sending emails are simple as you type words appear on a line and you can choose which word you want to use greatly speeding up doing emails.  It also has a mic for dictation or emails.

Reviews.Title: just do it!
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this thing. Buy the otter box with it. Saved my butt a couple times already :). Fun games, stunning video, awesome audio. Very great tablet. Would recommend highly!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX
Reviews.Author: ptee1208
Reviews.Content: I like my new kindle fire but why do I get emails saying I can get $30.00 off.  I would like to get $30 off.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it. Amazon Prime is DEFINITELY worth it. The selection of free movies and tv shows its WAY better than Netflix. If I had to pick one thing I wish this had was the ability to hook my external hard drive right to it and play movies that are on it but I can still copy movies to it. I also like the fact that you can side load Google Chrome and Gmail without rooting the Kindle and voiding warranty. Memory upgrades WAY cheaper than iPad too...

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: marchelle
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire is amazing!! I couldn't ask for a better tablet. Its inexspensive, very easy to download things..and its quite simple for a five year old. I would recommend anyone that is searching for a tablet to go with the kindle fire. You will not be disappointed!. Five star all the way!

Reviews.Title: Everything as advertised
Reviews.Author: Howard F. Mandel
Reviews.Content: I'm a dialysis patient and as such am strapped to a chair for hours three times a week.  The HDX provides me with books, TV, movies and music, all in the highest quality available.  All media at my fingertips when I only have one hand available is just the best.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: Love it! So much better than my old one. Faster and the colors. It's so far everything that I wanted Thank You

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: tiahra chandler
Reviews.Content: I own an iPad a kindle fire and a laptop. I got this as a Christmas gift  and I couldn't have received a better present. The battery lasts way longer than the original kindle fire and it also has way better clarity 5 stars Amazon!! This is by far my favorite device and since I received it I haven't touched any of my other devices

Reviews.Title: Wow! 5 star.
Reviews.Author: Billy Milbeck
Reviews.Content: Absolutely amazing tablet. Outrageously strong wi-fi antenna. Beautiful graphics. Nice & user friendly. Love that u can download prime movies. Only 2 things i can think of is I'm glad I got the 32gb & almost wished I gotten the 64gb. The 32gb was completely full after 4 movies(3 in HD & 1 SD) I understand from a business perspective but wished they could've added micro sd storage. Also lockin me out gmail & youtube on a android device is a bummer. But overall I am truly impressed with the Hdx. Nice work Amazon! Easily takes the ipad vs hdx competition

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: frabo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my wife - being I have the Samsung 10.1 and am very dissatisfied with Samsung - I thought I would give this a try. Believe me, it has the Samsung beat in every way imaginable to the point I am considering throwing this piece of crap Samsung in the garbage and purchasing another kindle fire HDX 8.9" for myself.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Karen Miller "karen2323"
Reviews.Content: I have used Ipad, mini ipad and the kindle fire. But far, the kindle fire is the all around best. Small and portable. My grandkids loves the games. Battery life is good and its so portable. I got this for Valentines day from my sweetie and glad he got it for me. I would recommend it for all ages. The 7" is a great present for a younger child.

Reviews.Title: Old Timer Friendly Device
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey B. Potts
Reviews.Content: I can't help but be amazed at the technology that goes into making these wonderful machines.  Book reading, game playing, e-mail and numerous other uses including surfing the web and hosting your FaceBook page.  Very user friendly.  Great job Amazon. :)

Reviews.Title: Buy this great invention
Reviews.Author: Susanne J Claar
Reviews.Content: This tablet is wonderful...I can see the screen easily...the colors are fabulous...getting around all the different sites is so easy... I would recommend the BOX highly...especially to the 60's crowd..solo easy to use

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: B. Oswald
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife for Christmas and she has hardly put it down!! Just the right size and the live help button is a feature that she finds most useful.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 WI-FI, 64GB Rocks!
Reviews.Author: DRB "ScorpioDave"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle and it just is amazing....It has it all. Ipads are nice but the specs on this unit are amazing!  I loved my Kindle HD 8.9 but this new Kindle Rocks!  The screen resolution is amazing....very fast processor and lighter, the bazel edge is smaller so the screen looks much bigger. I can only say buy this unit...you will absolutely love it. It has everything you could want and more, plus free apps with Prime....and so forth...wow...

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: Inge-merethe Otey "graitdane"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire is the best that Amazon has put out I love it and the Mayday button is great I have used it ones it work just like they said it would,nobody will go wrong with this Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: product review
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: What a difference over my old Kindle.  Com had one when they first came out.  This one is amazing.  My phone and check computer are lonely because I can pretty much do everything now on my Kindle

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Diva45
Reviews.Content: I just love my new Kindle HDX 8.9, I already own the Kindle Fire HD 32GB "7". It's easy to use, & I just love Amazon, I'm really excited that I now have a rear camera, cause I just love taking pictures. It's very light easy to use, I'm trying to get use to how fast it goes. Anyone who don't have one please purchase one it's really something you and the whole family can used.

Reviews.Title: Ongoing problems
Reviews.Author: BillFL
Reviews.Content: The resolution is excellent, response times very good.Problem: intermittently unit stopped with the blue screen of death; upon rebooting blue screen still displayed; after several minutes unit would reboot but reboot extremely slow.Occasionally, when using back arrow unit aborted with totally black screen; same reboot problem.Tech support made assurances fix would be downloaded; did not happenStill some hidden bugs in the overall system

Reviews.Title: I am a happy camper!
Reviews.Author: H. McCaddin
Reviews.Content: I have only had this for a few days, but I love it! The battery is long lasting so far, but haven't watched movies or anything yet. It was a breeze to get set up and going. Very user friendly and so skinny! I have yet to have an issue with it. Will add to review if something negative pops up in the future. Am very happy now!

Reviews.Title: Love the HDX
Reviews.Author: Diamond D
Reviews.Content: I had a HD fire, and thought it was good, but the HDX blows the HD fire away! It's so much faster, sleeker, and lighter. Great price, great product!

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: maam
Reviews.Content: worked right out the box very easy to maneuver screen brightness is adjustabel and or adjust for you love that feature. HD quality is fantastic. still figuring out features but very happy with. light weight fits in my bag without weighing it down. battery charges doe snot last it you are playing games for hours on end and forget the time! oops! need to buy a second one so hubby will leave mine alone

Reviews.Title: GREAT !
Reviews.Author: tetvet6768
Reviews.Content: Bar none - nothing less can be said. Great screen, great color, great graphics, great lay-out, great UI, great apps, easy set-up and integration with other components (Kindle PaperWhite 3G) and previous purchases of books, etc.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful, with one tiny issue.
Reviews.Author: Kellen Wynn
Reviews.Content: Incredibly impressed with this tablet. Startlingly light, fast and responsive. Sure, the Appstore is lacking, but side loading apps is super simple. Mayday works perfectly, just as advertised.You can't get a better tablet, this size with this kind of hardware, for the price. Definitely recommend!----------UPDATE------------This is just a personal opinion, and I'm not going to dock a star or anything. I just don't like how the charger fits into the device. It sits at a kind of cock-eyed angle, sort of pointed up. I feel like I'm breaking it every time I plug it in to charge. Not a big deal at all! Just be kind of careful.ALSO! I'd recommend getting rid of the special offers. (which you can do at anytime, for $15 plus tax) I felt like it really drained my battery very quickly. Again, just a personal opinion. My original opinion stands, that this is the best tablet you can get for the money, and really is the best tablet I have ever used.----------UPDATE #2----------Finally having issues at a little under three months, I knew such an amazing device has to have a flaw. Starting 3 days ago, my Kindle started spazzing out (the only way to describe it). It wouldn't select the book I requested, instead it opened Silk and navigated me through 2 yahoo pages and a Wikipedia entry, all by itself. It freaked out while scrolling, arbitrarily zooming in an out of pictures on twitter and Facebook. While reading, it would highlight words and navigate me all through the reading menus and stuff. It was exhausting. I did a factory reset last night, thinking it was something I downloaded. This did not resolve the issue. So I called Amazon Customer Service today for help. Within 5 minutes, after explaining my problem, they offered to replace my device, which will be here by Saturday, 03/15. I am docking one star, because Customer Service does not attest to the quality of the device. I haven't dropped my Kindle a single time in 3 months, it's barely even been out of my house. These issues were just out of the blue and random.Other than this issue, the device was great and I'm really looking forward to my replacement and jumping back into my books and tv shows :D

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: David N. Olson
Reviews.Content: In general, I'm a big fan of Kindle products and the concept behind them.  I buy a LOT of books, and buying as many of them as possible in Kindle form keeps my house from being completely overrun with them.  I started with the first generation Kindle Fire, and have since purchased a Kindle Paperwhite as well as this item, the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"  This is in many ways the best Kindle of all, and is superb for reading my many books on photography.  And on a related note, the Origami cover works very well, too.My only complaint about the entire Kindle experience is the way that mathematical expressions are treated.  Mathematical expressions display on the page much too small in comparison to the text.  In some books, the equations are so small that you can almost miss the fact that they are there at all.  It's true that in most cases, you can press on an equation and then select zoom to make it larger; however, that leaves you with just the equation isolated from the text that describes it.  I can understand that maybe it's cheaper to treat mathematical expressions like illustrations instead of putting them in MathML and displaying them that way.  What I don't understand is why the default size of the expressions has to be so small.  When I read a book on photography, the picture that is being described is displayed at an appropriate scale; if I want to zoom in, I can study it in more detail.  Why can't mathematical expressions display at an appropriate scale.  It really reduces the value of reading books on mathematics or physics on the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: You don't have to be a reader to love the Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: PentwaterGma
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my DH for Christmas this year. He is not at all computer savy and wanted something for internet, FB, and email. It is perfect for someone that doesn't really need a computer. The Kindle Fire will cover everything he needs and then some. He was tickled that he can get movies and TV free from Prime, and that he can hook it up to his TV to watch them. He was also surprised at the ease of shopping for music, shows, and apps.I was surprised and pleased that Amazon included the wall plug-in this year, but wish it would have been posted in the description. I spent the $20 on the separate one thinking it was just like last year's model since I couldn't find where it said it was included. No matter, I'm keeping it for myself to replace my old Kindle charger.

Reviews.Title: I love my new Fire.
Reviews.Author: Boog Smith
Reviews.Content: I received my new kindle fire HDX 8.9 today and im extremely happy with it.  I have been a loyal amazon customer ever since the first kindle fire.  But I was always disappointed with each version that I bought.  I also own a 8.9 hd version.  The HDX model is everything I wanted the original fire to be.  The only hiccup in the tablet is the silk browser.  It runs fast enough but my only problem with it is the lack of adjustable font and lack of a dark mode.  Oterwise the tablet is a dream.  I solved the problem with the browser by downloading the UC browser which has many features that I like and it is my default browser.  The complaint of lack of apps in the amazon store is easily solved with 1mobile and aptoid app stores.  I love my new tablet and just want to say that amazon has done a fantastic job improving the Fire line.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Graphics
Reviews.Author: Ryan Williams
Reviews.Content: As for an entertainment device, the HDX is outstanding. My only drawback was that the apps are not friendly with my office applications. I am sure as time goes on the app store will be very comparable to the google store.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Janice C. Friel
Reviews.Content: Never thought a strap would be so convenient. Love the ID pocket and auto on/off. This was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: OUTSTANDING!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "falcon"
Reviews.Content: I was so pleased with my "HD" ... I was not looking for significant advances for a long time.  The HDX is really spectacular. Every element of this tablet is the best ... I can't imagine what the next HDX advance could bring.  One caution ... the price tag was a big "move up".  If that continues ... the Kindle Fire will lose it's edge!

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: the HDX is wonderful. the clear bright screen works great both indoors and outside in the sun. I can sit outside and read my books I downloaded. I love the white background also. makes it much easier to read. picking up wifi also works great outside away from the router. I'm very happy I bought the Kindle HDX over the I-pad I was looking at also. thanks for making a great unit.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Happy With My purchase
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Penelope Twain"
Reviews.Content: Pretty light.  Video quality is very crisp.  Sound is good enough...although I wish it were a little louder.  Very easy to navigate and I am just a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: Have only had a couple of days so will add more later if any changes
Reviews.Author: srh
Reviews.Content: Okay, my husband tried to get me to purchase one of these as my BDAY present from him.  I dithered because I am very untech savvy and was afraid it wouldn't meet my needs.  I finally made the purchase and am so pleased with how easy it is to use.  I spent about 60 minutes with our company IT helpdesk and bingo I was linked in with my company intranet WIFI, getting my Outlook e-mails, etc.  I have been able to download a bunch of free apps.  The picture quality is really amazing.  Crystal clear and it is FAST.  So for a person who wants to turn something on and have it work this has been ideal so far.  Also used Mayday once just to see how that would work out.  I was connected within seconds and the person was super helpful and we were done in a couple of minutes.  Well down AMAZON!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is the BEST Tablet on the Market
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "CEMurray"
Reviews.Content: I'm not a techie so my review is just your average Joe Reviewer. So as a Prime Member Amazon let me experience the AMAZING Kindle HDX Fire 8.9 for 30 days and I was very impressed.Prior to the offer I had been considering purchasing a laptop vs. a tablet. Well I bought the laptop and had to return it after 30-days because it crashed on me.So then I started exploring tablets. I just wanted something that was comparable to a laptop without all the bulk.The Kindle Fire HDX is light, easy hold, sleek and has a beautiful picture screen compared to both the Samsung and Apple tablets. And I love the MAYDAY feature! I wish ALL products had this feature especially for my PARENTS so they don't have to call me (I love my parents dearly but I'm not the tech person they think I am...lol)Movies look great on the HDX Fire, reading is easy. It's VERY FAST and responsive, no lagging. I downloaded an app so I could read and edit Word and Excel documents. And the PREDICTIVE TEXT is on point!If I had one complaint it would be the limited number of apps in the Amazon store compared to Apple and the Android market. And one major missing app for me (and the reason it has 4-stars and not 5) is no dedicated YouTube app! There is a 3rd party YouTube app in the Amazon store but it has ads (yes ads in addition to the ads you get prior to a video starting) and is not as fluid as the dedicated app. Amazon, work it out with Google and get a YouTube app!One other disappointment, which Amazon has no control over, is the lack of animated page turns when reading a book. I love to read, and I love even more the realism you get when turning the pages with an electronic device and it looks like a real book. Well apparently Apple bought the patent/rights to that animated feature (WTH?). At least that's my understanding. But outside of that, reading on the Kindle is a joy and fun with all the interactive features with the highlighting and comments from other users as you read.Overall if you can afford it, I highly recommend the Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 (the 7 is too small) over any other tablet out there including the Apple iPad Air!

Reviews.Title: Does Everything
Reviews.Author: Daniel A. Bahr "Dan"
Reviews.Content: Except for an Office Suite this beauty does everything well  Very thin and surprisingly light with a gorgeous screen, I don't regret moving away from my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Overall, love it
Reviews.Author: JayBird
Reviews.Content: Likes: great for movies and video, fantastic display, games run good, very fast , fling is great for watching movies, easy to create play lists and copy songs to storage or cloud, fast to boot, nearly every feature is as good as they said. Plenty of apps to pick from and a lot are free.  I chose this over apple and am  happy.  Supports Kodak AIO printers on the Cloud.  Holds charge good. Bluetooth keyboard is pretty cool if you decide to get one.  Mayday is pretty cool.  Used it a few times, although they tech support seems a bit lacking on the support skills for this product and often lost/dropped me during support.Dislikes: a lot of sites require adobe flash {not available for this}, also if you want an equalizer for it, none of them seem to work with it {tried a lot of them and no luck} and it does not have its own, so you are stuck with what ever it has as its default {needs more bass}.  I would like a firefox browser also, but theirs is ok for now.Overall I would get one again over Apple {and i am an Apple lover}.  Size, price. performance, and usability are all good reasons to choose this product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: L. Hinojosa "-Laura"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent piece of hardware. The screen has stunning resolution and the operating system is pretty intuitive so you should learn the system in no time. The speakers have great sound and the battery life has been more than sufficient for travel days.My main concern when buying was the lack of synchronicity with all my Apple based products. But in retrospect I don't really use the tablet in a way that I would require it to auto push updates to and from my MacBook/iPhone.

Reviews.Title: The bigger screen is better.
Reviews.Author: Gayle Street
Reviews.Content: I like the bigger screen with a clear picture for viewing movies and reading books.  I also like the live chat feature when I need help.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: john l thompson
Reviews.Content: I really enjoying my new Kindle fire HDX 8.9 and for my first tablet I think this is by far the best.  Had use the Mayday button for a little problem, the technician was a great help I will definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Look out Tablet World!
Reviews.Author: Oz
Reviews.Content: BOOM! Another win for Amazon....Light, fast, functional and perfectly priced. Whoever you buy this for will be very satisfied and happy!

Reviews.Title: No complaint
Reviews.Author: Danilo M. Mijares
Reviews.Content: So far I enjoyed using this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  Picture and sound are fantastic.  It is very easily to hold, not like the Apple iPad.  Overall - no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Grams910
Reviews.Content: I have been using a Kindle 3G Touch - so I gave myself a late Birthday present - early Christmas present.  So far I have had no trouble with it and I love it.  Still getting use to it.  Need to find good apps for it.  So far have had trouble with finding what I am looking for.

Reviews.Title: Endorsed by Moms
Reviews.Author: Chickpea
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my 68 year old mother (shhh...don't tell her I told you how old she is).  She absolutely loves it.  Keeps raving about the clarity of the screen, the instant help button, and how easy it is to use (which means she isn't calling me to ask how to work it - bonus!)  Seems like a win-win gift for all!

Reviews.Title: Another Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Katheen A. Sitzman
Reviews.Content: Love the fact that it has two cameras and can print to a wireless printer.  And do enjoy the larger screen

Reviews.Title: Best for me!
Reviews.Author: alindwurm
Reviews.Content: I have looked at other tablets and even purchased an iPad so I could compare the Fire with it. The Fire, for me at least,  is easier to use.I do wish the screen was larger and wish that I can use the account I already have with Google play to watch the movies I already purchased via my Pantech Flex, but that's okay. The best part is reading my books on a larger screen. And, Mayday is just great! It's wonderful to have a customer service rep ready to help you anytime. I am very happy I chose this Kindle Fire! And, yes, the iPad was returned.

Reviews.Title: Very nice quality of picture and sound
Reviews.Author: HaTsUnE NeKo "Life is a puzzle, and someone f...
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace my Kindle Fire SD version. love it but it does have a downside at this moment, it don't like netgear wireless modems. At the time of this review that's about the only downside of this product. but since all my wireless and modems are of netgear i cant connect it to the net without piggybacking it off another network.It is a known issue so it is being worked on.So unless you have a netgear network, you should be fine.Awesome product and great picture quality.5 stars for everything, -1 star for the netgear problem.

Reviews.Title: Just arrived
Reviews.Author: Tom Airhart
Reviews.Content: This Kindle just arrived on December 10th so I haven't had a chance to put it through its paces yet.  I did take advantage of trying the Mayday button and the service is prompt and efficient.  The HDX is head and shoulders above the Fire HD in performance.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: uneekfish
Reviews.Content: So sharp and clear.  My first tablet, but I looked at others and I liked the layout of this one and the size is just right for me.

Reviews.Title: awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: showitup
Reviews.Content: I really like this Kindle.  It's smaller than my Ipad. I take better pictures and all the apps I have on my ipad was able to put on the Kindle. I really like the flash light on the Kindle. With my volume and power button on the back of the Kindle is helpful for when my Lil girl wants to play with it and she can't because she don't know how to turn it on. Even though this is only a trial to use I want it and will sale my ipad to be able to purchase the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: DogMom
Reviews.Content: Just got it to replace my Kindle Fire HD which I already loved.  This upgrade is GREAT!  It's much faster, and the display is amazing.  I stream content when I exercise which means I can watch Amazon Prime, Netflix, Showtime and HBO.  My only criticism, which isn't about the device but the cover, is that you have to take it out of the cover to use the camera.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: marilyn hewson
Reviews.Content: This is my first kindle that i bought for myself. Its very easy to use and the display is so clear! I love using it and would recommend it to anyone wanting a great tablet!

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Michael Dixon
Reviews.Content: sound quality is absolutely fantastic. This is my fourth Kindle I absolutely love this tablet it is beautiful.. Picture is really beautiful it is so light easiy to handle I haven't had to use Mayday yet but I'm sure that will be great also. Amazon knocked this one out of the park

Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Really awesome tablet. Games and app run flawlessly with the speed. No time at all to load up games. Only downside for now is the inability to set a background. Once we get that update it'll be perfect

Reviews.Title: KINDLE AND PRIME!
Reviews.Author: COREY YOUNG
Reviews.Content: Love it! Books come at a steal amazon have everything you could ever need cant wait for helicopter drone delivery...

Reviews.Title: best tablet
Reviews.Author: joey hamilton
Reviews.Content: Great tablet very fast big screen does everything you could possibly want to do. Great range on the WiFi a must buy

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Ginger M Artigue
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire quickly. Awesome product!  Easy to use and battery stays charged a long time. Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Tried it free for 30 days and did not want to give it back. So great for our family to watch shows, play games and read.so convenient to check emails as well. Picture quality was amazing!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Twigg
Reviews.Content: So far my wife really likes it and has given me permission to dispose of her 1st generation iPad to help defray the cost of HER Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant
Reviews.Author: Gregory Bleeker Jr.
Reviews.Content: The "Mayday Button" is awesome, within 5 seconds I had someone on my screen both times I pushed it, it helps having an Amazon Prime account if you plan on buying this...Not as featuresque as the iPad Air which I have also, but it can come pretty close at times...

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: thomas
Reviews.Content: I've been reading a kindle for a very long time.  Have read over 300 books on my old kindle.  Just decided to order the new kindle fire.  It has definitely exceeded my expectations.  I've recommended the kindle fire to all my friends and my book club.  It's awesome!

Reviews.Title: Love it (with a few complaints)
Reviews.Author: LUCY EARHART
Reviews.Content: This was given to me as a gift and I love it!  I had a Nook color that was smaller and more bulky.  This is slim and easy to use.  I only have three small complaints.  One:  I don't like where they placed the plugin for the charger on the device.  Two:  There should be more font size options for books.  There are only two and the Nook had several.  Three:  So far, there is only one option for a case and that is the origami case.  It doubles the weight because it is a heavy duty case and I don't like the way you have to maneuver it to get it to a standing position.  Other then those three small complaints, I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: It is light weighted and has two cameras
Reviews.Author: Margaret A. Gourdine
Reviews.Content: I like it.  It is much lighter that the original Kindle so you can take it with you without being weighted down.  I also like that I can take pictures with it instead of also having to take a camera with me also.

Reviews.Title: The new Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX
Reviews.Author: John B
Reviews.Content: best Kindle ever! The display just pops out at you. The new Silk is a great improvement. Mayday is a nice feature. The display for reading as bright and clear. The new thinner design makes it much easier to hold while reading. I think this was an excellent investment.

Reviews.Title: HDX everything I wanted and more.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I have been using the original kindle for about two years now.  The Fire HDX blows that one one away.  I can do so much more.  The HDX has a brilliant screen, great sound, and very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: YAY! SO Pretty!
Reviews.Author: Metalette
Reviews.Content: After years of being single, I think I want to marry my new Kindle HDX 8.9.... *sigh* Love at first sight.

Reviews.Title: HDX Dream Machine
Reviews.Author: nedjinski
Reviews.Content: It's hard not to give this thing 5 stars - I was an early Kindle Fire adopter - I had the first edition KF 7" , then the 8.9 HD, and now the 8.9 HDX. The evolution of this device has been amazing. With each iteration I was highly impressed, but none more so than this new HDX - it is simply incredible - very fast, very smooth, light weight, super sharp screen graphics. I can't imagine these things being exponentially better in a year or two.I would like it if it were more of a device open to the rest of the world - meaning it would run all apps in the google play store seamlessly - but it does what it does very, very well.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Quality tablet for reading/web browsing.
Reviews.Author: LostITGuy
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Kindle Fire HDX as the kindle versions of books I needed were $120+ cheaper.  As far as the HDX unit itself, I've been very impressed with the build quality and construction.  My unit does not exhibit the blue tinge that I've read about in other reviews, and backlight quality is phenomenal.  I use my HDX primarily for reading and web browsing, and both have been very enjoyable on the unit.  Both Kindle books and PDFs look absolutely gorgeous on the 2560x1600 screen (even older scanned texts).  I ended up purchasing the 8.9" as the 7" screen was too small for me.  Web browsing with the silk browser also looks great although there is stuttering on some bloated pages (I have not tried side-loading the Google Play store and using chrome yet).  Overall I'm very happy with my purchase and can definitely recommend the unit to anyone using it primarily for web browsing/reading.As far as the special offers, they only show up on the home/lock screen and are not annoying.  I haven't paid to remove them as they really have not bothered me (and I've been lazy)

Reviews.Title: fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Loraine Burtch "Lori B"
Reviews.Content: This machine is absolutely great.  The pictures it takes are better than my expensive cameras.  I read lots, so the Kindle Fire has been wonderful in that I load my books in Cloud and open them when I'm ready to read each one.  This is the third Kindle I've owned and I must say that each of them, the original, the paper white, and the Fire, is fantastic.  I can't be without my Kindle  period, end of report!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Daarlyn
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"! This is my 3rd Kindle (#1 was a 2nd generation Kindle reader, #2 was a 1st generation Kindle fire) and they just keep getting better. The screen size is great, colors and graphics are amazing and it is VERY lightweight.I use it for reading and surfing the web and it passes with flying colors. Very fast as well. Good job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: yes to kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Love it. Would have been a five if it had flash player potential. Easy to learn. Easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Great for games
Reviews.Author: Bernice A. Watson "neicey"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle. Its larger than my old one of course and much easier to see when I play games which I do a lot.

Reviews.Title: Beest tablt
Reviews.Author: Diana L. Lillar
Reviews.Content: I use it at various meetings and to take notes, and minutes. Love the size and the portability. Awesome Appstore and software.

Reviews.Title: In Love With My Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Micky "Micky @My Book Habit"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. It's much lighter and thinner than my last Kindle Fire, so it's much more portable. I can slip this one in my purse and not worry about it weighing it down.With each version Amazon keeps getting better and better. They have added new text-to-speech narrators and other awesome features which is great. I wouldn't trade my Kindle for a thing.

Reviews.Title: Not a fair rating, but
Reviews.Author: PLEASANT L LINDSEY
Reviews.Content: I want to give it 4.5 stars but Amazon's system won't let you do that.  I've almost stopped reading paper books completely because of the convenience of this tablet.  Interestingly it can do so much more, but I'm so impressed by the the onscreen book reproductions and the unit's available storage that reading is the only thing I use it for anyway.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Upgrade
Reviews.Author: charlene
Reviews.Content: So far I have been very pleased with my Kindle Fire HDX. I haven't tried to link my Reader's Digest subscription to it yet.  I hope I won't have any problems doing that.

Reviews.Title: OMG.....LOVE IT...../
Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle....Started out with the no bells plain old read a book, then I ventured out and started looking at the Kindle HD Iv'e had a blast with that. then comes the HDX, this has got to be the best yet, it's light does everything they say and more....I am still playing with it, have so much to learn. One thing I wish I would have read on here is about the mirrowing your movies....if you do not have a newer model TV then you need to buy a Devise to stream the movies through. I dont mind but wish I would have known sooner so as I could have bought what I needed then. I'll up date as I learn more when I have the time.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for flying
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: As some one who travels quite a bit for work being able to download and watch a bunch of moves and tv shows, including HBO shows, and play them offline makes it worth the cost alone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Catwoman "bookcrazy"
Reviews.Content: Great sharp images larger screen makes it easier to see the books which is what I mainly use it for. Playing candy crush is more enjoyable than on the kindle fire 7" even beats out my desktop. However my order was lost by Amazon and I ended up having to run to best buy to get the replacement for $30.00 less which worked out better for me n the long run!

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: K. Kasaba
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying its functionality! It is everything I expected it to be, I would suggest that others purchase one as soon as they are able.

Reviews.Title: Not An IPad BUT
Reviews.Author: C. Snead "STi  Mtn  Man"
Reviews.Content: This is a really good alternative to the much more expensive tablets out there. It's fast, attractive, and handles normal needs very well. I own the 7" HD and there is no comparison to the Xs better performance. Kendle cases are way too expensive so I purchased a Poetic one that keeps the unit from normal scratches and dings. At 20%of the cost it's a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Great device for the less than tech savvy person
Reviews.Author: DJK
Reviews.Content: I like the fact I can manage the device for the person I bought it for using my amazon account.

Reviews.Title: Right desition
Reviews.Author: ReadingBitch
Reviews.Content: I played with the thought to get a Kindle for a while and finally gave in, now I wonder why I did waited for so long. I mainly use it for reading. I have so many books that I decided to get the 64 GB one so that I can have a bigger part always with me without hoping for Wi-Fi.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: Kalani Waldron
Reviews.Content: This is a great product and fun to use. I will be using this tablet for years. Perfect size too.

Reviews.Title: My husband loves it
Reviews.Author: T. Driste
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my husbands bdayHe had an older Kindle and it needed to be updatedHe loves his Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire is great!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: The clarity is wonderful and I love the Mayday feature.  They were very helpful and knowledgeable  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Echo Karras
Reviews.Content: LOVE the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9! Bought it as a birthday gift for my husband (will probably buy another for myself!). It works FAST, it's fun and easy to use, and the Amazon pricing special made it affordable.We have only used the "help" person once, but it was wonderful to SEE & HEAR who was helping us - a new high in customer service.I would recommend the Kindle Fire HDX to ANYONE looking for a tablet - one of our sons is in the Army and stationed abroad, so my husband loves to be able to keep in touch using his Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Excited then let down with app availability
Reviews.Author: dkarger
Reviews.Content: Love the product but rather dismayed when the play store is not available on the Kindle and a lot of the apps that I had purchased were not available to me or even available in the Kindle store. Of course there is always a way around everything which I found but why would you make it difficult to begin with.

Reviews.Title: Nolt what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Ronnie V
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle HDX 8.9 for six months, and I have to say I am terribly disappointed.  Other than the camera and slightly larger screen, it is not much better than my Kindle Fire.  The processing speed is annoyingly slow.  There are other tablets with processors that are so much faster than this one.
