It seems that whenever two or more of us with different tablets are looking for an answer, everyone finds it before I do.  And frankly, the Kindle Fire is easier to turn off and on.  I bought this tablet because of a promotion Amazon was running, and frankly, I wish I had not.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, WIFI, 64GB
Reviews.Author: Ethel 2
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase of this kindle. I have the original kindle and this one has faster speed and better color. I also like that it has a camera and takes great pictures. I also like that you had the option of choosing a payment plan for it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for Amazon Prime subscribers
Reviews.Author: K D Romaine
Reviews.Content: Being a subscriber to Amazon Prime I decided to give this tablet a try. It has a great screen and impressive sound coming from tablet speakers. It is ideal for watching videos and listening to music. Accessing content from Amazon is almost too easy, but that is one reason I bought it.I still prefer to read books on my old Kindle reader, which is much kinder to my eyes.One major complaint I have regarding the Kindle Fire is the lack of apps, particularly for accessing other cloud storage services like Dropbox and OneDrive. Hopefully this will get resolved in the near future. With more apps this tablet could beat out the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Fine display, responsive, but WiFi could be better
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "dfwc"
Reviews.Content: I have had the device long enough to find that I like pretty much everything except the WiFi radio. First, it seems to suck battery more than the Nexus 7 I owned previously. I find that I must put it in 'airplane' mode when I am not using the network to get decent battery life. Worse, I find that the connection to my local wireless router becomes unresponsive after some amount of use. I find that I have to occasionally toggle the 'airplane' mode to get a good connection again. I don't have to do this often, but enough to be noticeable. Other than this, the device behaves as advertised.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle.  I wish it was adobe acrobat compatible but they do have a video program that lets you access things like cbs.com so at least video streaming works for online stations.  Not able to use it for gaming.  Awesome sound and video quality over all.

Reviews.Title: Love watching videos
Reviews.Author: Sydney's Mom "7923"
Reviews.Content: I got this so I could use the Prime downloads for off line viewing on an airplane, as I spend a fair amount of time on an airplane.  But, as I am sure Amazon figured out, I buy far more movies and TV shows than I get for free.  The ability to watch an episode of a TV series without commercials is priceless.  I have the entire Breaking Bad series in my library, and before each trip, I just download a couple episodes and watch on the plane.  The resolution is stunning.  I also have an ipad air, and I watch Amazon videos on it.  For the price, there is no comparison.  I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I have an ipad air just because there are a couple apps I need that were only available on ios.I also love reading on my Fire.  Just not at night.  I have found that the non-backlit display of the Paperwhite is much more conducive to sleep.The price reduction makes this my favorite android tablet.  I have an old Samsung Galaxy Tab, and when that dies, I am sticking with the Fire as my android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great price on an upgrade to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Marsha Schultz
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  I have an original Kindle Fire and still use that to read books at night.  I bought the upgrade to use the camera and video feature.  This works great for taping track athletes at meets and showing them a great clear picture of how they are doing.  The internet is also much faster on this version.  I also enjoy being able to watch movies or shows on it because of the great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful hardware, but it software is too limited
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The hardware is wonderful: fast, smooth operation with a great display.The purchase price is very reasonable, but it comes at a cost: Amazon will not let you install software other than what is in their apps library (yes, you can "side load", but that doesn't actually work particularly well). And that means you miss out on things like the native g-mail app (yes, it's better than Amazon's e-mail app), browsers like Chrome and Firefox (yes, they're better than Silk), and so on.The integration with Amazon prime means that watching videos is easy, and Amazon also lets you stream Netflix. It's kind of hard to argue too much with Amazon's trade-off of low price in return for being mostly limited to Amazon's offerings, but this Kindle would be so much better if you could also use Google's app library.Amazon, please open up the Fire HDX to other app libraries!

Reviews.Title: Its OK if You're Near a Wifi
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: But don't expect to watch movies in the car after downloading them, doesn't work.. you need Wifi so for my purposes, this tablet had limited use. I returned it to Amazon and received a full refund, no problem. Otherwise the device is cool around the house with Wifi.

Reviews.Title: dissatisfied after one month of ownership...
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah Patoka
Reviews.Content: Amazon has put together some great hardware at an impressive price. The interest-free installment plan makes it extremely affordable.  Having my Amazon Prime services at my fingertips is great.  If this were all that matters in a tablet, FIVE STARS!But, the Amazon app store and ecosystem is a sad and depressing state of affairs. Google has apparently boycotted Amazon's store, so any app you've purchased on Google Play Store will not be available. There's no Chrome browser, no YouTube app (OMG!), no Gmail app... what about the Google star map app?  Nope.  Google maps?  *sigh*  I'm usually aggravated that the normal, every day tasks that I take for granted on my Android phone are a P.I.T.A on this thing.  I rarely leave the house with it.Worse still, major publishers *might* have their Android apps on the Amazon store, but when you search for your favorite apps you're more than likely to find a ton of cunningly named applications from unknown publishers.  If you do find a major vendor's application from a (hopefully) legitimate publisher, you'll pay for it again and maybe they'll update the app as often as the Google Play store version.  Or maybe not.The Amazon Silk browser works well, but it's not what I want (privacy??) and good luck finding an alternative.  At least I could find proper versions of Spotify, Tumblr and Facebook.  Sketchbook Pro is nice.  I managed to find a PC tool to download apps from Google's store as .APK files and then sideload them into the Amazon Fire OS, but that's a lot of effort and the Google services are not available to keep that app updated or enable many of it's features.  You'll be tempted to download .APK files from forums and warez sites, but then you're guaranteed to become infected.Anyway, If you're an Android hacker with an Amazon Prime account and looking for great hardware at a very low price (all seven of you), you might have a few, warranty-voiding choices after buying this tablet: 1) find a way to root the device and install Google's Play services and applications.  Or, 2) root the device, flash it with a custom Android ROM, load Google's services and apps, and then install Amazon's applications from the Google Store (Kindle Reader, Amazon Prime Video, Amazon Workspaces, etc).Or, rather, I'm still researching this.  I hope we have some options.  Otherwise, I think I made a mistake.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Michael McPhearson
Reviews.Content: I love the 8.9" Kindle Fire HDX,love the screen and everything it does,it's more or less the big brother of the 7" and also does a few other things it doesn't.I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: I'm hooked on Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Dinah Lamunyon
Reviews.Content: Love  my new Kindle Fire. Just the right size for ease of reading & transporting. Like the black & white text for ease of reading out in the sun.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: What a great tablet this Kindle is!  The clarity of the screen is superb, the Wi-Fi is quick, and the help feature just adds another layer of consumer friendliness!

Reviews.Title: Great customer service, bad device
Reviews.Author: Eggie "EGGMAN"
Reviews.Content: I don't know if it's my device only but this unit will not charge until it's at 10% battery life left. I did the mayday thing but they were not able to help nor was customer service which by the way, Amazon has the best customer service and the reason for the 4 stars

Reviews.Title: Most excellent
Reviews.Author: S.J.
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. It does everything I want and does it quickly. All in all, a very good buy

Reviews.Title: I love this!
Reviews.Author: J. Coy
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a the original Kindle and I dearly love this one (I loved my old one too). I like the fact that I can play my dumb games on it, I can do my facebook and pinterest time. The resolution is superb!! It is thin and lightweight and has a nice backing that doesn't slip through your hands. It's a pleasure to read on it, or do anything on it.If I had one complaint it's that I can only do one thing at a time on it.I also don't like the fact that I have to go into the settings to kill off apps and clear the cache - but I can live with that. Someday I'll find a good app killer for it.I would recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet! I think there are plenty of games available for it, but have seen reviews that say there aren't enough.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: i love it don't think i would have been any happier if i would have spent more money and purchased a ipad

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Hart
Reviews.Content: This is a great product with great options and easy to handle. I like it very much and keep it by my side constantly.

Reviews.Title: A bigger screen helps and is a big plus
Reviews.Author: John Hanley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Kindle (my 3rd) before Christmas. I have not been a big fan of reading devices before as they were too small.However, this Kindle Fire is big enough that I can use it whenever I want. I am seeing impaired and by double tapping a web page I can comfortably use this Kindle.Note: I do not use the Kindle for book reading (my girlfriend does and often wants it first after dinner). I use it primarily to keep up to date on my work or hobbies for which it is excellently purposed for me. My son uses it to watch Amazon Prime movies with ear-buds.Note: I don't remember when we bought the first Amazon Kindle (five years ago maybe), but all three continue to work with no issues. We have all of the Apple iPad generations also and I would say that they are very close in quality and ease of use. For my family Amazon Prime is the key factor (movies for everyone and the big screen for me and low cost books).

Reviews.Title: Not Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Zito Medeiros
Reviews.Content: I must admit that the picture quality is excellent, but the sound is only mediocre.  It is quick and responds well.  The battery lasts a real long time.  My main disappointment is that the operating system is a modified version of Android.  As a result, many of the apps I am used to on my phone cannot be installed on the Kindle.  One of the main reasons I bought this Kindle was to read one of my magazines that is only digital now.  I downloaded the previous issue with no issues, but when I try to download the current version, I get an error claiming that I have to update some software.  Some of the apps not available are Google Now and Zinio,  I feel like I overpaid for this at $379.  I feel that I should haves hopped around for a Android 4.2 tablet, and i would probably have found something comparable for less than half the price.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: L. Clark
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is amazing, it is sharp, clear, and love the front and rear facing camera. The games just seem to come alive. I had a Kindle Fire HD, and it only had the front facing camera, which made it difficult to take pictures. I find myself reading more and enjoying playing the games as well. Internet connection is great, and it is faster.

Reviews.Title: new Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: granmuey
Reviews.Content: I really didn't need this Kindle but I sure wanted it.  It is a treat to use, lighter than my other Kindle and clearer.  Although I was perfectly satisfied with my older version, this one has me spoiled.  I can take pictures now!  I keep one with me at all times.

Reviews.Title: love my choice.
Reviews.Author: Shenelle West
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle, runs very smoothly. I was a bit hesitant because I thought that it wouldn't be able to run some of my favourite programs, but it does and very well I must add.

Reviews.Title: Hoping my Kindle Fire HDX continues to impress me over time !
Reviews.Author: terry
Reviews.Content: So far , In love with my New Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  , although with most things time will tell ! Hoping my Kindle Fire HDX continues to impress me over time !

Reviews.Title: Fantastic birthday gift
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" as a gift and it is great.  Wonderful, clear, sharp color, quick downloads, instant internet connections, very light weight and manageable size.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: Linda L. Bleskan "CAT LOVER"
Reviews.Content: Love my 4th kindle.  Best to read or listen to and great to surf the web , pay my bills, games, and will print my stuff too.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Lewis
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before purchasing my tablet. The Kindle came highly recommended by a co-worker. It's light, a great crisp picture and absolutely fun!!  I love my Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing Device
Reviews.Author: Bruno Ierulli
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my new Kindle Fire HDX. Very thin, light and durable. It's wicked fast and simple to use right out of the box. I was an iPad groupy for years and had a Nexus 7.  This is my first Kindle, and I. Absolutely love it. Very stylish design, with a non slip rubbery finish on the back. You won't be disappointed. I recommend you purchase the model with no ads. It's one continuous infomercial on your device and lock screen.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: I would recommend one of these to anyone! I'm extremely happy with the Kindle fire HDX 8.9! It's pretty fast!

Reviews.Title: it pretty sweet but...
Reviews.Author: p0w3rg10v3
Reviews.Content: It seems like all the commercials on television or ads I see online showcase games that seem like they're only available on iPad...  Other than that I think it's great.

Reviews.Title: Review for Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Hans J. Suchanek
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. For my age (65) is it very easy to handle. Mostly I am using it for Skype to be connected A/V with my relatives in Europe.I wished I had a printed short manual available to find troubleshooting help, especially if my screen is going black. Please supply a laminated manual similar to spark charts to help me and the elderly.I will take my kindle to a trip to Europe  and will try to convince my daughter to buy another kindle for herself. By the way, the pictures made with my kindle are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: In love!  <3  <3  <3
Reviews.Author: pchy
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best mobile device I've owned.  The tablet is extremely light, making it easy to hold while reading.  Fonts on screen are super crisp.  The backlight adjusts correctly so it isn't blinding at night.  The tablet is responsive and snappy.  And to top it all off, the BATTERY LIFE is amazing!  Beautifully done Amazon.  Beautifully done!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: C. Serio "Mom of 2 beauties"
Reviews.Content: We got this mainly for when my husband travels and it has been exactly what he needed.  He can watch movies or read.  He also can check his email and we were able to Skype with him on his latest trip.  It was very easy to set up and we love the Kindle Free Time for the kids.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Missy Mullins
Reviews.Content: I adore my Kindle Fire HDX. I take it everywhere and use it all the time. Everyone is shocked when I tell them it is a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Elinor P. Olson
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle Fire HDX 8,9.but have not as yet tried all of the options.  As I learn more about all that can be accomplished on the kindle I'm sure I'll add a star!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Anthony M Murray
Reviews.Content: I love it. I have no complaints or comments. It is a great product. It is a very good product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: TP "mom"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my new Kindle.  I still have so much to learn about it, but I am looking forward to using it for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Learning Curve
Reviews.Author: Steve Townsend
Reviews.Content: Maybe I'm just behind the times, but I have had trouble getting used to the "different" way of navigating on a tablet.  I love the bright, sharp picture, and apps I've downloaded have been good.  I have had trouble with different passwords, which has been rather frustrating.  Overall though, it is a great device, and I'm sure I will get the hang of it eventually.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 16GB For Photography
Reviews.Author: ArtisticCowboy
Reviews.Content: Let’s make this review simple and to the point so hopefully it will help someone make a good decision about whether to buy this or not.I am 52 years old, an avid photographer and fairly tech savvy (I build my own computers). I do have a business license for photography but do more free than for paid. My number one goal was to use this device for my photography to make it easier to view images then my excellent but small screen on the back of my Canon EOS 5D Mk-III. I wanted a very bright screen, highest resolution I could find, best color reproduction I could get, light and long lasting on batteries, and easy to use. I also wanted it to be easy to setup and fast for photography because, let’s face it, if I have to wait to see my images on this I won’t use it in the long run and it will become something to collect dust.So how do I feel about it so far? AWESOME! This device lives up to everything I had hoped. Even my wife enjoyed using it and wanted to learn more about the software (CamRanger). I do admit that in a very bright sunny outdoor area (used it yesterday in the mountains for a bridal shot) it is harder to see the screen. Now note I said “harder”, not impossible. It was still much better than the screen on the camera and it allowed my beautiful wife to better assist me in my shoots. You can connect this with an Eye-fi card or with a CamRanger. I did both. (Go look up my name as a reviewer on the CamRanger). I do not recommend the Eye-fi for pros. It is too unreliable and to fussy.Bottom line: I would definitely recommend this to others for photography. I will always have it in my bag wherever my camera goes. It is also very enjoyable to use for surfing the net and reading the latest eBooks (I read a lot of photo how-to books all the time). It is beautiful, light, fast, slick, easy to carry and fun. And did I mention that the screen is downright gorgeous?Enough said.May this review help those who are trying to decide. God bless!Bill C.

Reviews.Title: Replacing my computer
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Loeffler
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a dream come true. It allows me freedom to browse without being tied to my computer.  The only drawback is that it can't open some types of files.

Reviews.Title: Love reading my PDFs on this
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Walker
Reviews.Content: I get a lot of art instructions or magazines that are in pdf format.  I just discovered how easy it is to email them to the Kindle by using my kindle email address assigned to this new device.I still read regular 'text' stories on my Kindle keyboard, but this is for my art books and magazines that need that color format.  I've been reading them on my computer using the Kindle app, but this is so much nice to have available.  I also enjoy the camera feature.  The special offers are not obtrusive either.  I tried them on my keyboard once and they were totally obnoxious, eating up part of the screen all of the time, but not so with this version.  You only see the offers when you first turn the device on while the screen is still locked.  I am very happy with this device, although there is glare on the screen if you are in strong light, so I will be researching the glare screens available.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sharona
Reviews.Content: Great buy..Checked out others but the pluses of this one won my heart. This is my 3rd kindle. I just seem to upgrade my kindle. Can't imagine what will be next.  Great sound,  AWESOME color.Super fast downloads..Glad I chose Kindle again.

Reviews.Title: I really recommend this machine
Reviews.Author: Joe Ferreira
Reviews.Content: I do like the Kindle fire HDX because I had an iPad and I like this better this machine is faster and it's got better resolution camera takes great great pictures

Reviews.Title: Love it! Love it! Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Donna Mcgovern "Donna"
Reviews.Content: Kindle did it again! I had gotten the first kindle fire when it first came out, now this one is outstanding! It basically has it's own brain!!  Can't say enough!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is nice
Reviews.Author: James H.
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is nice and take everywhere I go.  I enjoy reading from it and surfing using the Silk browser.

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx
Reviews.Author: geckogirl548
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire hdx 4 G lite. The screen is bigger and easier to read. I like that the on/off and volume buttons are on the back on opposite sides. This is my 6th kindle, so I know my kindles. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Light weight and powerful tablet
Reviews.Author: Kindler
Reviews.Content: Minimum weight, great screen, a powerful CPU, large memory, simple interface, convenient Amazon services. This is all I got for the minimum money. In my collection were and there are tablets, as a NOOK Color, Asus Transformer, Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD 8.9", NOOK HD Plus. So, the choice is absolutely relevant, meaningful and perfect result.

Reviews.Title: Apple man loves new kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Marcus Davis
Reviews.Content: I love it. It's just the right size . Ultra light and the display is perfect. I am an Apple guy but I really love my new k kindle fire..And thanks Amazon.for.letting me.pay it off in installments!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: ramvenfu
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great for the hardware and its performance, one drawback is Amazon limits some apps that you can download. I would like to have gmail, and chrome on it. I would not recommend the advertising one, it is worth the thirty dollars to not have it especially if you have kids.The battery life is great, lasts a long time. I get two days on one charge and that is with full use during the day. 17 hours is not a lie, this battery lasts 17 hours of use. The screen is great and is very better than my 42 hd tv with a blueray player, my son actually prefers to watch his shows on it. (16 months). He just got interested in educational shows and responds better to the Kindle than the TV.I like how easy it is to use your amazon products in kindle, I have prime so I download Barney videos and when out and about son can watch them. Makes for a nice dinner when he is watching his shows.Where would I go with this, well I would integrate Kindle fire OS with Ubuntu because of the close business relationship they have with Canonical also a tablet as powerful as the new kindle fire hdx would kill with Ubuntu. I have an old HP laptop with similar hardware specs and when I first was using it with Ubuntu I thought I had bought a new laptop. I am thinking of getting several more Kindle's for my wife and son, and maybe then one will convert into a Ubuntu tablet.I bought it because it was similar to or better than an Ipad or Ipad mini after owning one I know it is better than an Ipad even the latest ones on market right now, my friend just bough an Ipad and is thinking of returning it to get a KIndle HDX 8.9 because of price and well, he also has prime and likes he can rent/download videos with his prime. The kindle freetime is great too, although I have not set up an account for my son because he is just a bit too young.My only complaint is well Amazon is a bit like Apple with the apps and restrictions, let us use all the android apps, also allow for a dual boot Ubuntu :) tablet with an Amazon prime app that allows us to still take advantage of all the Amazon-Kindle environment.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful first tablet!
Reviews.Author: shelby220
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, great picture/camera! I love it... I use it for Netflix, social media, and reading. Great tablet!  I highly recommend purchasing this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is a 5 Alarm
Reviews.Author: Kelly A. Meegan
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire is a 5 Alarm I am very pleased with my new Kindle Fire and I would recommend over an Ipad especially if you use it primarily as an ereader.

Reviews.Title: BEST KINDLE EVER
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOOOOOOOOVE!  We can find nothing negative about this device!!! Our entire family loves our kindles, the HDX much more so!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for everyone!
Reviews.Author: Nick Greene
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture qualityGreat layout and designOrganization of apps/books/music/etc is greatI would recommend to all of my friends and family!

Reviews.Title: A great gift
Reviews.Author: frances b lee
Reviews.Content: It was a fun gift at Christmas, little did I Granny know it would help me in schoolI find it easy to use and find info on things I don't know. LOOOOVE IT!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my kindle,the only thing I h a v e against I t is t h at u cannot use Google chrome

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX *.9"
Reviews.Author: Franklin S. Daley
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX surpassed everything I expected it to do.I have not started to use it to its fullest

Reviews.Title: Not an IPad - on purpose!
Reviews.Author: Fester Slamstone
Reviews.Content: This is not an IPad! And that is why it is great - don't get me wrong Apple does a lot of things great, but for  a user that only needs certain functionality, this is THE value on the market. Screen? AWESOME, Speed? YUP! Simple? Pretty easy and if you screw something up just call in the AMAZONIONS with the MAYDAY feature.Great Christmas gift for the non-power user in my house.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Nina
Reviews.Content: I originally bought the Kindle because I though it was so cool how you could do documents and entertainment stuff on it, but found out that you have to download the Microsoft Document App because it does not come included on the Kindle. I don't know why they tell us this if it isn't true! But oh well, it worked out because Kindle gave me a bunch of "coins" for downloading certain apps that they were advertising that I could use towards the already discounted price of the app. It's originally I think $10 but was on sale for $5 and I didn't have to pay for the app anyway which is good! But now I can do everything on my Kindle! Watch Netflix or Hulu or go on Facebook and create documents! Screen and display is perfect even if you download a Movie or Show in Standard instead of HD it still looks like HD!! I just wish downloading movies didn't take up SO much space on the Kindle but it does. Plus it sooo lightweight and pretty. It sucks though that it has no nice and normal screen savers and they're just AD's and if you want them gone you have to pay an extra $15 but some are helpful and they're not too annoying. But overall I have no complaints. I got mine for Chistmas '14 and so far nothing has gone wrong! Tested out the Help option and they are true to their word that you can speak with a live person! Haven't had the need to really use it yet though so that's good! I highly recommend :)

Reviews.Title: it is ok but
Reviews.Author: Steven M Gagnon
Reviews.Content: the apps that i want to get will not work on it and cost to much when i paid almost 500 dollars for it when can you get the free app so i can get my dishanywhere to work like on my laptop  thank you for the help if you can

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: doc2
Reviews.Content: Just Fantastic!!  I can do everything with the Kindle Fire XDX that other tablets can and much faster!!  I recommend this tech gadget to ALL!!

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: David M.Hartness
Reviews.Content: This product is fast and has an easy to use interface. The screen resolution is amazing. I'm still learning and the screen size could be slightly bigger but all the feature are great.

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: red hen
Reviews.Content: So very easy to read.  Colors are just very intense, vibrant, and appropriate. I am very happy to have selected this model and brand.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!  Download most movies/tv shows and watch offline...  And interfaced with IMDB!
Reviews.Author: Scott.R "Yea!"
Reviews.Content: *** What a great feature to download movies and TV shows at no 'additional' charge, so THANK YOU AMAZON!  I did not know this feature was available when I purchased the tablet. Now I can most watch movies/TV shows offline when Wi-Fi is not available.*** No space problem for my 16GB - I downloaded a full length movie at 720 HD and the available space went from 7.1 to 5.3 for a decrease of about 2 GB. That makes 2 - 720 HD movies downloaded and with my other apps/books the device still has 5.3 GB available... so still plenty of space available. Due to download times I use 720 HD which is still an incredible picture quality due to the small size of tablets.  It's really is a waste of time and space to download 1080 HD... unless the 13" table down the road is not a myth...*** I love the X-Ray feature showing the movie and TV shows' with the IMDB connection of cast biographies and other their titles, ratings and interesting general trivia...  the IMDB cast changes as the actors change from scene to scene...*** The Dolby sound is amazing.***  In my opinion, the KF may not have the quantity of apps, but does have a ton of 'useful' apps.  The KF and other android tablets have the best euchre app by far... compared to the other non-android tablet...  and I love playing euchre.  The other word and numbers (such as Sudoku) type apps are on par with any other tablet...***  Cannot comment on the camera - who uses a tablet to take pictures anyway?***  THE BEST WARRANTY even when out of the warranty period...  Amazon has replaced several our older KFs which were out of warranty since it was our first problem... that is incredible service.***  I used the Mayday feature and sure enough the response was just a few minutes... he corrected the audio problem quickly which I should have figured out myself in the first place.  He wrote on the screen since I could not hear him.  How cool was that...  and I believe there is no charge for online help even if it is out of the warranty period.Our family has the KF and the other top rated non-android tablet and love both...  one is just too costly for me, but apparently my wife can afford the more expensive one.Insert a product link[Cancel]

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: CMOR
Reviews.Content: It is great for reading and surfing the internet, watching tv,  & playing games. Am looking forward to more apps coming for this device.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle. I really like this one. It is like a small computer,not just a book reader. I do every thing on it.Most of the time  I don't have  to even get  my lap top out. It's very lightweight and slender. I take it ever where.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Love
Reviews.Author: jane m wolfe
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire! I can take it with me any were and to tell the truth I have. It has great color and I never get any glare from the sun. I tell all my friends that it is a must have.

Reviews.Title: another "hit" for Kindle
Reviews.Author: SMS1253
Reviews.Content: LOVE  the new HDX! User friendly, sound is superior, and price is right.  8.9 in. is perfect size for over 50 crowd. Keeps viewing screen compact but not too small for those of us using readers : ) Another great product in the Kindle line

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: Pamela J. Francisco
Reviews.Content: I love everything about my kindle except that I didn't buy the one that I didn't need Wifi but that was my mistake. I use it several hours a day and LOVE the Mayday feature.  Highly recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: NICE TECHNOLOGY
Reviews.Author: DOUGLAS PETTIT
Reviews.Content: Love ability to go on the net mobile and actually see what is on the screen. Very light and easy to handle.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire !!!!
Reviews.Author: Lynne
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 for about 1 month.  I love it. I have the Amazon Prime and have watched several show/movies and it is great.  I can view my Facebook, email, Pintrest  and more.  I also love the Mayday Option, I always know if I have a problem or question they are always there to help and are very friendly.  Would recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: my kindle
Reviews.Author: Damaris Velazquez
Reviews.Content: It's actually pretty cool. I'm able to do practically every thing that I'd do on a desk/lap top... I'm very happy with my kindle

Reviews.Title: Very Handy
Reviews.Author: The Chosen Ones Cs
Reviews.Content: I would have given the HDX 8.9 5 stars except that there are a few little quirks that I have to get used to. For example, there is no way, that I've found, that will allow me to delete multiple emails at once. So I have to delete emails from my mailbox individually.On the positive side...this thing pretty much allows me to take care of my business the same as I would be able to on my laptop. Not to mention, I can read books without having to maintain a paper bookmark...lol. I am even able to participate in online conference calls, which is awesome.Oh, and one more good thing...for those of you that don't have the mobile phone upgrade on your Kindle, if you subscribe to Skype for $2.99 a month, you have a fully functional cell phone that calls Skype numbers and cell numbers and the call quality is very clear.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Judy Koffroth
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet to use for travel. It's lightweight, and has a lot of apps. It was highly recommended by the salesperson.I tried pairing it with my HOTSPOT for secure, online purchases, banking, etc. while traveling only to learn that the devices are not compatible. Had I known this before purchase, I'd have made another choice.

Reviews.Title: Nice device and cheaper than Apple...but
Reviews.Author: Kestrel Hess
Reviews.Content: One would think this should work very much like an Android phone and in many cases it does.  It lacks the support for many of the apps, however, and struggles to be as productive as the iPad for only $100 less.  It sits in between the productivity of the Windows Tablets and the iPads but seems priced more as the more productive Apple.  If you are using just Amazon, great.  It doesn't have Chrome support or any other browser, which has its drawbacks.  Most of the games you enjoy on your phone either need to be re-purchased (inexplicably) or simply aren't supported.  The touch is pretty good though it sometimes runs a bit slow.  It is better than my Windows Venue 8 Pro but less well than the iPad Air (or any of the previous iPads).  Decent device but you might want to save for the iPad which does nearly everything just a little bit better.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: WAB
Reviews.Content: The Fire HDX (mine 64GB, 8.9") is a superb tablet. My first was stolen, and I had no hesitation in choosing the identical unit to replace it. My only suggestion would involve the motion (rotation) sensor. It is far too sensitive. Only the slightest inadvertent rotation will change the portrait/landscape orientation. This was evident in both my units. Live Tech support could only suggest locking in the desired orientation (Options menu). As the Kindle Fire line did not exhibit this behavior, I must assume this was a less than optimal design decision, which hopefully can be corrected in a future software release. That said, everything else is state-of-the-art. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Terrific!
Reviews.Author: Mrs Pat McKenny
Reviews.Content: I  just love it.  It is with me at all hours!  The screen is so bright, and it makes reading so enjoyable,  And it is so easy to download other apps.  I had gotten an Apple first, but found that it did not live up to expectations...the technical help, such an integral part of the advertised product, was impossible to reach.  This Mayday button really WORKS!

Reviews.Title: The judge is still out.
Reviews.Author: Robert Ross
Reviews.Content: I picked three stars because this is the first tablet of any sort I have owned, so I have nothing to compare it to. I am used to windows format and no touch screen so that took a bit of getting used to. The best thing so far is the HELP app. The live people have been great and very helpful to a non tech savy old person.

Reviews.Title: Love it - however...
Reviews.Author: CQ80
Reviews.Content: I really love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9' 16GB. It's awesome. Sound quality is great. Size is great. I enjoy watching Netflix on it. Facebooking is not slow, like how it is on my iPhone. I love using Overdrive on it for audiobooks rented from my library. I love getting free ebooks through Amazon. The only issue I have with the product is that my wifi doesn't always stay connected. I'm not sure why that is but it's still a great product. If I did a lot of internet browsing on my Kindle I'm sure it would drive me nuts but I mainly use it for eBooks, Overdrive, and Netflixing.

Reviews.Title: Gave up my NOOK
Reviews.Author: Don Riggs
Reviews.Content: I have had a NOOK for three years and really liked it but it had limited uses. My Kindle fire allows me to do so many things that the NOOK did not offer like the number of apps, music, and ease of internet access. The speed of the fire is great. The resolution is fantastic.The complaint I have is the difficulty in getting the NOOK app on the Kindle. I have a lot of books and magazines on that system.

Reviews.Title: limited application library is the only major problem
Reviews.Author: T. Crisman "Johnny Dangerously"
Reviews.Content: Everything about this piece of equipment is incredible, the screen resolution, the response time, even the menu system is excellent.  I also feel a lot less locked in than I do with my apple equipment.  Definitely one of the coolest toys I've ever owned, and the battery life is exceptional, it seems to last at least as long as my ipad 2.  The big problem?  The app store.  Outside of the most popular apps of all time, you're not going to have much luck finding a lot of things that are in other app stores.  The app store is much worse than google play and comically bad when compared to the apple app store.  Still, it's a much better piece of equipment when compared to the alternatives at a much better price.  If you buy it, more software developers will build for it and you'll probably be able to use it longer than the alternatives given the equipment specs.

Reviews.Title: Love this Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Samantha J. Secor
Reviews.Content: The HDX Fire 8.9 is awesome!  The screen is so amazingly clear. The device itself is easy to use and it has all the capabilites you would find in a laptop - email, camera, internet, etc!

Reviews.Title: light, good screen, fast processor. Also good for reading, I can replace the kindle paperwhite most the time.
Reviews.Author: Tsung Dow Huang
Reviews.Content: It is much lighter than IPAD2, a good screen good for my eyes and almost as good as the Kindle paperwhite I have too, I am more and more reply on this new device to do most of my work, e-mail, facebook, reading my collections... I think I make a good investment.

Reviews.Title: Great gift...mayday could be better
Reviews.Author: QueenV
Reviews.Content: Gift for my Mom and she loves it. We went with this rather than the iPad because it had a great front and rear camera and the iPad camera has lousy resolution and she's single and it came with the live help. Well she had to call several times during setup because mayday help focuses on navigation. Amazon really needs to change that and beef up this potentially very cool edge to their product. Mom is enjoying and has her email setup and surfs regularly on it, takes photos, and reads.

Reviews.Title: Great little computer
Reviews.Author: S. Lewis
Reviews.Content: I previously had the original Kindle Fire.  When it could not be repaired, I got the Kindle Fire HDX.  I use it for everything I would use a desktop computer for, and in addition it has a built in camera and I can read books on it.  Only problem I have is that I can't play Draw Something because the Kindle Fire HDX is not compatible with that game.  Not sure why since the older Kindle Fire was compatible.

Reviews.Title: Bewildering at first
Reviews.Author: spewak
Reviews.Content: Once you get past that this is no ordinary Android tablet, you start to enjoy all that Amazon has to offer thru using the Kindle. I am a Prime subscriber so the benefits are rather enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Gary Best
Reviews.Content: It has lived up to everything I thought it should be. Would buy another if something happen to this one.

Reviews.Title: logging out???
Reviews.Author: Michele Ramont
Reviews.Content: I am still getting used to it and I do like it.  I don't understand why it doesn't have the option to log out of your email account.  It just doesn't make sense to me.

Reviews.Title: The best Kindle Fire by far...
Reviews.Author: Nowie
Reviews.Content: I have owned all versions of the Kindle Fire, which initially was a nice companion to the iPad, but not nearly as fast processor-wise or user friendly.  The new HDX is really good.  The apps that I have used previously and were "clunky," such as HBO GO, are excellent now--the processor is greatly improved.  Still the best for books and other readable items.  I have told many of my friends about the improvements, and the price was very good also.  Very well done...

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "khde"
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  WOW !!!!!!!! The graphics and sound are incredible . Size is awesome and light weight.The apps are fantastic , Love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: a lovely addition to the electronic toy collection
Reviews.Author: Roger W. Hawk
Reviews.Content: The images are so sharp and clear....makes you want to watch a movie right now.  This is our first tablet so we're learning a lot.  For the most part it's very easy to navigate, but we're having a little trouble mastering the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEAESED
Reviews.Author: Alice L
Reviews.Content: First time dealing with Amazon without any problems.My wife try the nook and did not like it. The first timeshe used the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" display she fell inlove with it.Alice

Reviews.Title: Christmas from Husband!
Reviews.Author: Alison Stoll
Reviews.Content: I love that I can read my favorite books and check my email.  Now I can use this wonderful amazing Kindle and not haul around my heavy laptop.  It is amazing.  I can connect to internet any time.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is Super!
Reviews.Author: tom harper
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the HDX 8.9; its many advanced features are certain to please most new or current tablet users.  Found that purchasing a User's Guide on the product to be quite helpful in navigating its features.  I was introducted to this product by a friend and was immediately taken in by it, which led to my purchase.  Thanks for creating it!Tom

Reviews.Title: Struggling with the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Sylvia L
Reviews.Content: I find the Kindle difficult to use particularly if you accidentally touch the screen and the system jumps out of what you were doing.. There is a lack of information on how to use it. I still have not been able to configure my email and the on-line help people were no help, they could not do it either. Have had this since Chistmas (a gift) but it is not being used any more. If it would not offend the giver, I would ask for the money back.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever!
Reviews.Author: Dianne H
Reviews.Content: I have used many tablet but ths one is the best.  I love the screen size and clarity.  It is very easy to read books on my tablet and it is much better than my Kindle e-reader!  There are tons of apps and games.  My grandkids love playing games on my Kindle Fire.  I also purchased a case for my kindle that has a keyboard in it so it is like a mini-computer to surf the web, write emails,  etc.  I couldn't be more pleased with my Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: S. P. Cliatt "Sandy C"
Reviews.Content: I really love my new kindle, but I do not like having to deal with the ads every time I turn it on. With the price of this tablet, we should not have the ads with it. I understand that we can pay an additional fee to have them removed. REALLY?!?! Also, my older kindle had a light that turned green when the charging was done. This one does not. It would have been a great feature to have included on this one.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire is HOT
Reviews.Author: Josheila Crandall
Reviews.Content: Looking at the reviews for the Kindle Fire HDX and comparing it to the IPad Air is a no brainer.  I was told by a colleague ofmine that he likes the apple because it is sexy.  Well guess what the Kindle Fire is just as sexy and more and the pictures make the Ipad Air look amateur.  Okay so you say the IPad has more apps well how many of those apps are you really going to use.  My suggestion buy the Kindle Fire and let Apple know they are not the only game in town, in fact they need to step up their game iof they are going to compete with Kindle.  Kindle Fire rocks in every way.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I expected!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had been waiting for an affordable 2 in 1 tablet/computer that included everything that I wanted but it seems that none of them met my requirements so I decided to table that idea and go with just a multimedia tablet with an emphasis on reading/video/music. I had previously purchased my wife a Nook since she is an avid Barnes and Noble shopper, but since I primarily shop for books at Amazon and have purchased quite a few music CDs from Amazon as well, I figured that I might as well go with the Fire HDX. Another factor in my decision was that I had already downloaded the Kindle reading app on my phone and computers and acquired quite a few free books for my library. I am a teacher and having these available on my classroom computer appealed to me.So that is "why" I went with the Fire HDX. I decided on the top of the line with everything except for 4G coverage because I figured that I would always have enough content to keep myself occupied between wifi hotspots and would never need the Kindle to download something urgently enough to require it right then when I was not in an area of coverage.I am totally impressed with the display on videos, the music sounds great when connected to quality headphones, and I already have enough books to keep me busy reading for quite a while. I need to remember to utilize my 64gb hard drive since so far everything that I need is sitting in the Amazon cloud. I never was a big gamer fan, but I've downloaded several free games and a few interesting apps and being a traditional guy, I will probably stay with a steady rotation of those when I feel like playing something instead of trying to improve my mind by reading.If I would have to give any negative comment to this device at all, it would have to be that it occasionally doesn't keep up with the buffer on streaming and doesn't play perfectly with a few online video apps like Watch ESPN or CBSSports. So far, I have had only one instance of it needing to catch up with an Amazon Prime video but it wasn't a huge problem and obviously could be remedied if you went ahead and downloaded the video before watching.Speaking of Amazon Prime, it seems many people are upset because all videos are not available with an Amazon Prime subscription. I just started my trial and will spending the next 30 days checking to see what is actually available with Prime. If I cannot find enough of the videos that I want to stream for free, then I will simply discontinue after the free trial. I did the same thing with Netflix because their selection did not have the newest or best videos available for streaming. The same seems to be true of Amazon Prime but I will give them the full trial period before passing judgement.  I suggest everyone check out the videos that are available through Prime before jumping on that wagon.Anyway, the Amazon Fire HDX is everything it says it is and apparently every bit the competitor for the Apple Ipad Air or the Nook, with a display that tips the scales in favor of the Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: joshua diaz
Reviews.Content: This tablet is just ok. I can't stand the constant (must be built in) advertisements that are constantly popping up. It is so annoying. From my understanding it how they kept the price down.  I would have paid an iPod price to avoid it. I don't notice a pixel difference between this tablet and my old iPad. I also find this tablet to be slow and lagging. The app selection is decent.  For basic internet surfing its ok.  I would suggest an iPad. 100%  thank god this was a gift.

Reviews.Title: My Review of Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful to be in bed and watch my favorite TV shows and movies!I love watching the Kindle while I am warm and snug in my bed.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but hard to read in bright light
Reviews.Author: David kitterman
Reviews.Content: The Fire is a great internet appliance, you can cruise the web, check email, and enjoy a light lap top, not.  But, for books it is less than wonderful.  The screen is reflective and isn't all that easy to read in the light.  If you read at night in bed, its fine.  Another anoing thing is all the comercialization that comes with the apps and standard Kindle.  Expect to be controlled by the commercialize Amazon appliance.  Would I recommend it, yes, as long as you live by Amazon.  Cheers, David

Reviews.Title: try and you will become a believer
Reviews.Author: Flower Lady
Reviews.Content: I purchased the original kindle fire a couple of years ago and really enjoyed. I wanted to upgrade and was torn between the air and the HDX 8.9. I decided to explore a trial of  30 days and was sold after less than an hour of usage. It is very easy to use and if needed May day is handy. Not only is there ease of use but very fast. This has replaced my laptop. I would recommend for all age groups as there is something for every with/without monitoring.

Reviews.Title: i like this and not that
Reviews.Author: bethany
Reviews.Content: So far so good. EXCELLENT picture quality, easy to use.  However, I often have to turn my Wi-Fi off and then on to use the internet or for apps, like Facebook for instance this always happens. Very annoying. Not sure what that is about.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd 8.9
Reviews.Author: Karla Biteman
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle for my birthday a month ago and I love it! I recommend this product to anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: james robert horvath
Reviews.Content: It's the best tablet out there u get what u pay for. The only downfall is you can're watch flash on it

Reviews.Title: Best Present EVER!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Maierson
Reviews.Content: I received this for Christmas and I have enjoyed it so much.  It is easily navigated and it serves my purpose well.  As soon as I catch up on my backlog of books here at home I will be using it to access the library on Amazon and reading more!Definitely recommend to anyone!  Even though I am still learning its' uses.

Reviews.Title: loooove it!!!
Reviews.Author: heidz
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX. I take it with me everywhere I go. If I had to give a criticism it would be the tipping trends to put spaces in between letters if I  don't watch. Not a biggie.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, great price.
Reviews.Author: Bob Kesler
Reviews.Content: First tablet I have owned. Light weight, fun to use, great display and I really, really like the Mayday button.

Reviews.Title: Great HD!!!

Reviews.Content: Love it simply love it!  I enjoy my books and games that I play on it its so handy and convenient!  My email and facebook are so handy also.

Reviews.Title: Love My 8.9" HDX!!
Reviews.Author: Frederick V. Vehorn
Reviews.Content: A great device,  HD is perfect. Fast processor.  Easy to navigate and use.  battery life is excellent. All round, first class, tablet.

Reviews.Title: wonderful gift. Kindle Fire HD X8.9,HDX
Reviews.Author: Monarch
Reviews.Content: AM one with limited knowledge at 70 yrs of age and found Amazon Help /Chatline is awesome.They are very courteous and patient.They also respond to every purchase made quickly.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas gift from my family!!
Reviews.Author: Winifred S Ansay
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying this as my best Christmas gift ever from my husband and children.  I am slowly learning the ins and outs and free books as well as best sellers and magazines.  My birthday is coming and I want to get a cover for it!

Reviews.Title: Addictive
Reviews.Author: Roxanne L. Kemper
Reviews.Content: I have had more fun with this tablet!  Actually, I'm spending way too much time on it.  Love all the free apps!

Reviews.Title: Excellent new Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany VanderVelde
Reviews.Content: I have a Kindle, but wanted one with a camera and bigger screen.  I absolutely love this model and am glad that I decided to upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Linda Glienke
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it!  Only one thing I wish -----wish I could use Adobe with it.Best Christmas present I could ask for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: C. Michael Blackwell "M. Blackwell"
Reviews.Content: I have purchased a total of 6 Kindles for my self and for gifts. They are excellent performers. I have had no trouble with any of the ones that I owned. They have performed very well. I still have my first generation fire and it works great and my wife still uses it as a reader and to watch movies on. The 8.9 HDX is a great tablet and is very fast and trouble free. I used the mayday button on it once and got immediate results from their tech. I would highly recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Does as promised
Reviews.Author: susanleeann
Reviews.Content: Great Ereader and does what it promises.  Just wish it were compatible with more of my favorites from my IPhone then it would be perfect!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: carolyn williams
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9! I have learned so much to do with it since Christmas 2013!

Reviews.Title: Love It!�
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: This kindle is amazing! It's battery doesn't run out easily, it's so light I can take it anywhere, the grafitcs are awesome, and you can read it where ever! I love my kindle! It's better then an iPad

Reviews.Title: Good device but needs some help.
Reviews.Author: Michael Politz
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice tablet for most things but is lacking in some crutial areas. It needs to be able to download adobe flash player. I cannot understand why it wouldnt be able to do something simple like that, many videos on facebook and youtube require flash player and the kindle fire hdx will not play them. Also you should be able to print from the kindle and that is another miss.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX8.9 HDX Display Wi FI 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Jenniffer
Reviews.Content: My son gave me the Kindle Fire for my Christmas present.  I can't put it down! It is everything I would want in a tablet. The light and color is EXCELLENT! I can check my email and compose email. I have a front and rear camera that takes EXCELLENT clear pictures. I can browse and shop for anything that I want with KINFLE Fire.  IT fits so comfortably in my hand and with just a light touch to the screen connects me to whatever  I want to do. It is great for everyone in your family to use. YOU can set parental controls and set time limits for your children or grandchildren.  Just as I am able to type this review , when I am reading a book and come upon a word that I need to know the definition, I LIGHTLY tap on the word, I can makes notes about the word and highlight the word.  There is so much to say, but I leave you with this, when you need help with something you press the help app and you get a real person  speaking back and forth with you, leading and guiding you through the process.  By the way you can see the person but the person cannot see you.  Go out and buy your New KINDLE FIRE! You won't regard it.

Reviews.Title: Not very user friendly and not enough memory for best quality
Reviews.Author: B. Mason
Reviews.Content: Graphics and picture are excellent, but it is not very user friendly.  Found that you can only download one movie at time if you want the best quality.  Maybe an additional extra should be an external flash drive port or SD card slot.

Reviews.Title: Greter Expectations
Reviews.Author: Sharon Harrington
Reviews.Content: It is not as easy or adaptable as I expectedI am not particularly technologically adept, but feedback made me think this would be a cinch!

Reviews.Title: Kindle is nice when it is working.
Reviews.Author: Josephine Burton
Reviews.Content: It is nice when it is working but Ihave had problems and right now it is froze! Going to try to return for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Power button and book reading.
Reviews.Author: tom wells
Reviews.Content: The power button shuts down immediately. Several times I have been in the middle of something and inadvertently touched the power button and shut down. Think about a delay before shutdown.Also I can't easily find the way to stop reading a book and return to home screen. I have swiped the screen different ways and tapped on different ways to no consistent result. I get the side panel, seemingly by magic, that allows me to get out to home screen. I try the same actions again with no result.On the other side, I find the picture and sound quality to excellent. Other features are good as well. I am really enjoying my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: flash needed
Reviews.Author: Zach Kroll
Reviews.Content: great tablet, but sometimes if I want to watch something without flash can't play  I can't say enough the great customer service that comes with the kindle.  I would purchase again and do become a prime member if you watch a lot of movies.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: David Barrymore
Reviews.Content: Thank God for Mayday!  As a first time tablet user, I'm at a loss with some of the icons and symbols.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Dana Ray
Reviews.Content: I considered the KF against the ipad and samsung tablet and chose the KF because I am a loyal amazonian and liked the lightness of it. I felt like I was cheating my book library by going through an app on another device. However not being able to change backgrounds/wallpapers, struggling to navigate through and find things, and needing to buy tokens to play within free apps and games is a turnoff. So....it is bigger and lighter than my old KF but I feel the limitations aren't worth the money. I would have been better off with the samsung tablet but hindsight is 20/20. It does serve it's purpose and is still a great reader so if that's all you want to do, go for it! And because I still love Amazon I do think their PRIME movie selection is better than Netflix streaming any day of the week.

Reviews.Title: Never too old to learn.
Reviews.Author: Ruth L. Richards
Reviews.Content: I still have lots to learn, but I'm having fun.  The Mayday feature is great.  I've only used it once so far and was so pleased with the polite helpful person I talked with.  Now I'm writing down things as I go along, so I'm better prepared with my questions.  I'm 74 yrs. old and decided it was time to energize my brain with something new.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: shirlyNoE
Reviews.Content: I thought that the Kindle would act as much like a tablet as an e-reader. That's not quite the case. As an e-reader it is excellent, as a tablet not so much. Many of the Android apps that I expected to be able to use are not available for the Kindle, like YouTube. There are apps that are similar, but not the one you expect. Same for several of the word games I play on my Android phone, not available on Kindle. The other disappointment was my local newspaper. I wanted the whole paper, with the same format. A reviewer posted a reply from the paper regarding the format that said Amazon restricted the way they could submit it. Also, love reading the magazines with the color display, but my favorite ones require you to download an app, and I preferred them to be downloaded instead so I can't get them either.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Michael John
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire exceeded my expectations. Works great, has good battery life and is extremely fast. Delivery was excellent and product is solid.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: webuff
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet, quality, sound, picture, light as a "feather" and you can do whatever you can do on most other more expensive tablets. What is there not to like? Nothing! This product exceeded my expectation. I highly recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: this thing is awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: dale mount
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife as a Christmas gift, and she is in heaven!!! I am thoroughly impressed with the graphics and performance of this little machine!! If you are considering purchasing a kindle, do it!! You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Wow fantastic Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Soda Pop "floppy disk"
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle HDX. However, the keyboard is smaller than the Kindle Fire and the charge indicator is so small I can barely see it. I have to log in to the device to see if the HDX is fully charged. I miss the green fully charged indicator light that is on the Kindle Fire.  The Power ON button is in an awkward place so I keep hitting the sound up/down button. The HDX blinks off while in use causing me to log in again.  I am reluctant to sell my Kindle Fire until I see how the HDX will perform over several months.The Apps are wonderful, the screen resolution is bright and clear the HDX has really nice accessories. I love reading and rarely leave home without my Kindle HDX.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic display and light and easy to handle
Reviews.Author: Carole M. Pearson "redbird5017"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle and I am so pleased with it. It is easy to navigate Quick downloading of books, apps and games. Fun to use and the Mayday help is amazing! Almost as soon as you push the help button there is someone there to help with your question or problem. I am very pleased with it and the ads that pop up when you turn it on are not distraction at all.

Reviews.Title: Kindle outshines iPad
Reviews.Author: F. Roberts
Reviews.Content: All of my friends have recent iPads. My Kindle stacks up with the iPad in every way. Thanks to the linkage with Amazon it has a number of positives that the iPad does not have. I think it is an excellent product at a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Text to Speech
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: If you move it shuts off, or skips pages then fails to catch up and shuts off.fix this=5 stars

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Mike Simpson
Reviews.Content: Great product, very worth price.  Have used both kindle and iPad, prefer the kindle for many reasons.  Shipping was fast.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Worth the upgrade
Reviews.Author: Joanne Widmer
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle, and by far the best! I am a Mac fanatic but couldn't see spending the extra money for an iPad... The Kindle Fire HDX does everything I need it to do and more.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Rodney Lutes
Reviews.Content: I love it. It is everything I thought it would be. Does everything that my wife's I pad does. It is Crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Helene Kyle
Reviews.Content: I had the earlier Kindle which I loved, but now that I have this larger one, there is no turning back.  The only thing I don't like about it is when I'm reading a book, playing a game, or whatever....it's often hard to get the "home" icon to come up to get back to the main menu.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: stephen stiers
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product do to price for the value, It can do all the things I need it to. And I would recommend it to others

Reviews.Title: Works even better than I expected
Reviews.Author: montanarex
Reviews.Content: I am by no means a computer wizard. This is my first step in a tablet, gradually breaking away from my standard desktop and laptop. We travel a lot and wanted something smaller to do my business things and web surfing. Lugging around a laptop to Mexico is a pain in the butt. This thing is many times faster than any of my pc's and it is pretty easy to get to learn how apps work on a tablet. My wife and I bought another one (heck we both have to have our own) after using the first one and enjoying it so much. I especially like that it comes with speech to text capabilities right out of  the box. The apps that are available make this thing an amazing piece of electronic equipment. Like I said, I'm no pc wizard but I can't find one thing I dislike about this product. Also I only had to use the MAYDAY button a couple times and it worked just as advertised. The help was quick, consise and fast.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire, great
Reviews.Author: KaylaNanna
Reviews.Content: I've had the new kindle fire hdx for two months now and I love it.  I also own a first generation kindle fire.  My first kindle was bought because I love to read. As my eyesight deteriorates I find it easier to read larger print. One of the greatest things about a kindle, no matter which one you own, is you can carry all of your books with you. No worries about storage space. Moving? No shipping.The HDX? Lighter. Camera quality is very good. Game graphics, excellent. My favorite? Having the kindle read to me. Now I can crochet and read (ok listen) at the same time. I can also listen to a book while I'm cooking.Had my granddaughter our yesterday and decided to try the kindle FreeTime.  My granddaughter loves it. She wanted me to give her my old kindle. Now she wants my new one. Well she has a birthday soon. So who knows.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!!
Reviews.Author: wolverine_girl
Reviews.Content: I like this product because it is a lot easier to use than a laptop (to me at least). Also, there are so many fun, new things to discover. I would recommend this for anyone!!

Reviews.Title: Happy with my new kindle
Reviews.Author: randy timbs
Reviews.Content: I wanted this for the larger display and the camera works really well. I am overall very happy with my new kindle and have had no issues moving into it. I also like having the internet available with this kindle.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Erickson
Reviews.Content: I love the bigger screen on this kindle and the ease of typing because the keyboard is bigger. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Touch Screen BIZZ
Reviews.Author: Oran
Reviews.Content: Exotic product ... too difficult to use with FAT fingers.  Great battery life ... FOR NOW !  How much will the cost be to replace it, since no user access is available !! ??

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: JACKIE SPEARS
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD, I AM ABLE TO COMPLETE INFO, THAT WILL HELP MY SELF AND MY GRANDDAUGHTER, THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Got to love it
Reviews.Author: Peggy Brennan
Reviews.Content: I am never bored, reading or playing games, what a wonderful, colorful and sharp picture item.  Couldn't have asked for better.

Reviews.Title: Kindlw Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: David Yahn
Reviews.Content: Has pretty much lived up to my expectations. Picture and sound are far better than my original Fire. Capabilities are greatly improved and there is some additional soft ware available. Book and movie selections remain outstanding but I still feel disappointment when I scroll through available apps. There appears to be a lot of trash available but that is my opinion and it may be exactly what others desire. Overall a great improvement.

Reviews.Title: #DISPLAY
Reviews.Author: Arthur Minto
Reviews.Content: 1st tablet is the best after ALL!! Some really KooL features that I cant get on my laptop or from my cell!

Reviews.Title: YEAAAAAAHHHH
Reviews.Author: Carlos Agrinsoni
Reviews.Content: shabalobdingdong! Is this this awesome! Light and vivrant this particular device is a technological wonder.I would highly recommend it for everyone!

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE 8.9, HDX
Reviews.Author: beej10
Reviews.Content: Enjoying my kindle. Very compact and lightweight and does just what I've wanted to stay connected. Pictures are so pretty!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Darryl Richardson
Reviews.Content: I brought this for my wife for Christmas and she just love it. oh did I mention this is her third kindle. They just keep getting better and better.

Reviews.Title: HDX is smooth
Reviews.Author: jbodden
Reviews.Content: It works great. I really enjoying using it. So far it has met all my expectations. It is much smoother to operate than my first generation Fire.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: jw
Reviews.Content: My first tablet. It's easy to use. It's all I expected and more. Everyone I've shown it to that already have tablets thinks it's great.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves her Kindle Fire that I purchasded at Christmas. Now Kindle Fire & myself are in competition for her private time!
Reviews.Author: Cooter
Reviews.Content: My wife loves Kindle Fire that I purchased for her for a Christmas present. Kindle Fire and myself are in competition for her private time! Shame on you Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: OKchic
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I have had a original Fire, and 2012 Fire HD 7". I wasn't really sure I could justify the upgrade this time, but I had wanted a little larger screen for a long time and really wanted one. I am glad I did. I had a little problem with the first one I received, but called and Amazon got me a replacement on the way immediately. I was able to use the first one until the replacement arrived and then sent back. This one is great. I love the great display, and I really love how light it is! I got a semi hard plastic shell type back for mine so it added almost no weight, after trying some other cases. I just slide that into a sleeve to put in my purse. It is so light weight for the size and is really comfortable to hold for long periods. I am a huge reader and listener of my Amazon Ebooks, so I love how seamlessly it works and syncs with my Kindle Paperwhite and other Fire HD. I actually had tried a Samsung Note for a few days, thinking I would try something different, but I am too much of an Amazon gal, and my books not being available to listen to easily for my commutes just was not working for me. The new Fire HDX is noticeably faster than the HD. I also love that it is much faster and with no interruptions when viewing Prime videos. I have had almost no problems with that. It sounds great and the videos are crisp and clear. I got a Bluetooth speaker I use some when I am up doing stuff around the house, so I can listen to my books or music. It is quickly becoming my constant companion. I was concerned about the lack of the Google play store just like many others. That is the main reason I tried the Samsung first. I do believe however, that the Amazon app store is improving all the time and for what I do, I have adequate apps. I do have a Samsung phone, so I do have access on it for anything I would run across that I couldn't get on my Fire. I think most people will be pleased. Give it a try! I am really glad I went ahead and got one. I haven't used my laptop in ages!

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: george kolb
Reviews.Content: Good product light weight ! Would recommend to anyone to replace most laptop functionsPrice was right but would recommend ordering cover and blutooth keyboard when purchasing

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: don
Reviews.Content: it's great. had my daughter help me set it up as she is very good with tablets. she owns an i pad. the kindle is easy to operate and i  really enjoy using it. my daughter was very impressed with it and thought the price was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Really great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael Sannes
Reviews.Content: It works great for what i use a tablet for. Great screen, easy to use. I would recommend it highly.Mike

Reviews.Title: Love this.
Reviews.Author: C. Turner
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle and it doesn't disappoint.  Easy to use and beautiful to look at.  I would highly recommend a Kindle for anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Carolyn S. Myers
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly and if I had questions, being able to chat with someone immediately is fantastic.  Walked me through exactly what I need to do.  Recommend to anyone wanting to purchase a tablet.

Reviews.Title: NEW OWNER OF A KINDLE FIRE HDX
Reviews.Author: trini girl
Reviews.Content: Love it, expect i will have it for a very long time. Thanks to amazon payment plan i finally feel i have come into the 21st century. My friends & family  also love the fact they can see me on skype.thanks amazon.

Reviews.Title: Better than the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Stephen Champlin
Reviews.Content: Have used both products, and the HDX is hands down the better tablet!  I would reccomend this product to anyone interested in an awesome tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the machine. I find it very easy once you know what to do. I am still learning about it. I brought books on it.The only thing I didn't like was not receiving an instruction book on it so I could read it first.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and set up, LOVE it so far!
Reviews.Author: Dane P.
Reviews.Content: I was expecting far less. I am surprised. Easy set up out of the box charge it and go. Only problem is fighting with the family over who gets to use it, translation I will end up buying more.....

Reviews.Title: Best one yet
Reviews.Author: kyrhyne
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her HDX.  The only thing that would make it better would be supporting flash and expanding the app store.  Outside of those two things, it's an amazing tablet!

Reviews.Title: Fire 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: papagreg
Reviews.Content: I am blown away by the design and performance of this e-pad.  This is my second, bought the original Fire when it came out a couple years ago.  Looks and feels great, software works fine, quick response for the few things I have used it for so far.  Amazon was also quick to ship and made adjustment to order when I asked for it.  Don't know much about electronics, but I know right now that this will be used 90% of the time for all my web surfing, email reading, taking on vacation, reading books and downloading movies to watch on the road.  Great reader also.  Battery life is good.  Setup is a breeze.  Wireless works great.  Don't know anything about gaming capabilities, look to other reviewers for that.  Pay the $79 per year to become a Prime member to realize the greatest advantages of this unit. The quality of this build is on a par with and maybe better than that red tree fruit that grows in Washington state.  I see some reviews griping about being tied to Amazon, but for my use and needs, that is a plus rather than a minus.  Could go on with praises, but you get the idea.  If you are on the fence and are an average tablet user, get it now.  If you have kids or are clumsy dropping things a lot, get the protective case, otherwise the cheap cover pad will be sufficient.
